entry.title: 1 Swiss ball, 1 yoga mat, 5 abdominal movements, 21 days to speed up your abdominal muscles
entry.content:
Speaking of Swiss ball, you may first think of yoga, Pilates and other softer looking sports, but in fact, as a multi-functional sports equipment, Swiss ball can also exercise our abdominal muscles well. The unstable environment it creates will make the training more difficult and double the abdominal effect.
Swiss Ball

Swiss ball was originally used as a kind of rehabilitation medical equipment to help people with motor nerve damage to restore balance and motor ability. Swiss ball practice can create an unstable environment to help promote the recovery of muscle function and enhance joint stability. As it plays an increasingly important role in the field of physical training and sports rehabilitation, Swiss ball training has gradually become a popular healthy sport. Swiss ball can train muscles of chest, abdomen, back, buttocks, legs and other body parts.
Here are 5 swiss balls to practice abdominal movements, so that you can burn fat at home and achieve your abdominal desire.
Push up wheel - Swiss Ball - flat support

Target muscle
Rectus abdominis, transversus abdominis, internal oblique abdominis and external oblique abdominis
Action steps
Action steps
Put the calf on the Swiss ball, hold the push up wheel in both hands, keep the arm perpendicular to the ground, tighten the abdomen, tighten the whole body, and maintain balance support for 60 seconds.
Push up wheel - Swiss Ball - push up

Target muscle
Pectoralis major, rectus abdominis, transverse abdominis, external oblique abdominis, internal oblique abdominis, triceps brachii
Action steps
Hold the push up wheel with both hands, keep the arms perpendicular to the ground, and then put both feet on the Swiss ball to control the balance with both arms and feet.
Bend the arms and lower the body until the upper arms are parallel to the ground. Tighten your abdomen and keep your body in a straight line. Continue for 1 second and return to the starting action.
Dumbbell - Swiss Ball - supine - chest roll

Target muscle
Rectus abdominis
Action steps
The upper body is lying on the Swiss ball, and the lower back fits the spherical surface. Feet firmly on the ground, knees bent. The body is lowered, stretched, and the neck is still. Hold the dumbbell in both hands and put it on your forehead.
Keep the buttocks fixed, tuck in and bend down, lift the shoulders up until you feel the abdominal contraction in place, and keep the back in contact with the Swiss ball. The process lasts for one second.
Dumbbell - Swiss Ball - supine - head up and belly up

Target muscle
Rectus abdominis, transversus abdominis, internal oblique abdominis and external oblique abdominis
Action steps
The upper body is lying on the Swiss ball, and the lower back fits the spherical surface. Feet firmly on the ground, knees bent. The body is lowered, stretched, and the neck is still. Hold the dumbbell in both hands and put it on your forehead.
Keep the buttocks fixed, tuck in and bend down, lift the shoulders up until you feel the abdominal contraction in place, and keep the back in contact with the Swiss ball. The process lasts for one second.
Note: when the air can’t control its own balance and has a tendency to slide, don’t rush to put down or throw the dumbbell to avoid secondary damage.
Dumbbell Swiss Ball supine hip bridge stable rotation

Target muscle
Internal oblique muscle, external oblique muscle and transverse muscle of abdomen
Action steps
The upper body is lying on the Swiss ball, and the lower back fits the spherical surface. Feet firmly on the ground, knees bent. The body is lowered, stretched, and the neck is still. Hold the dumbbell in both hands and put it on your forehead.
Keep your arms still, tighten your abdomen, slowly rotate to one side, stay for 1 second, and then return to the starting action.
For more details of efficient abdominal training, please refer to “crazy Abs: Chocolate ABS 8 weeks training plan”.
The above content comes from “crazy Abs: Chocolate ABS 8 weeks training plan”

entry.title: 96 fitness goddess, height 179, vest line clearly visible, loved by netizens
entry.content:
The rapid development of the times not only updates people’s living habits, but also updates everyone’s aesthetic concept. From fat to thin in Tang Dynasty to curvilinear now. Therefore, many girls have gradually embarked on the road of building body curve, which also gains health and self-discipline.

There is a girl from Shandong Province in 1996. She has a sexy and charming buttock with a hip circumference of 94cm, which makes people forget the vulgarity. She’s ADA_ MAA, that’s just her online name. Although she is very young, but look at the photos can clearly feel her little sexy and intellectual beauty.

Ada_ Maa’s height is close to 1.8 meters, and her beauty is no less than that of a star. As a result, online fans have called goddess, in fact, she deserves it. The tight arm muscle curve, the full sense of waistcoat line and the round peach hips are very enviable.

But it’s not out of thin air that she has today’s figure. It’s through thousands of sweats in the gym. It took her four years to shape her body curves, especially her hips.

And just as she expected, since the exercise of peach hips, she can easily highlight her good figure no matter in Qipao or other tight dresses. No one wants to stand beside her when taking pictures with her best friend. After all, the contrast is too obvious, the average girl’s figure is always shriveled.

It can be seen that hip curve is a key point to change the female curve. In addition, hip training can enhance the health of lower limbs and make the body more symmetrical. Good exercise can not only strengthen the body, but also make everyone’s body curve more sexy and beautiful.

Next, Xiao Bian will recommend ADA to you_ Maa’s daily hip training, let’s learn it quickly!
Action 1: split squat
**

*Action tips: * this action is mainly to exercise the muscles of our buttocks and legs. We need to prepare a pair of dumbbells and a bench with the instep of one leg resting on the bench to keep the core tight and the back straight.
Take a deep breath, then squat down, squat as low as possible, and then stand up on the exhalation, alternate on both sides, do ten times on one side, repeat four groups.
*Action 2: barbell buttock push

Action tips: * this action is mainly to exercise our hip muscles. First of all, you need to prepare the pedal. The height is about 40 cm. There is also a barbell. The counterweight should be adjusted according to your own situation. Your feet should be the same width as your hips, and your back should be on the pedal.
Put the barbell on the hip joint, then push the buttocks up, exhale when pushing up, stop for one second when reaching the top, and inhale when going down, 15 times in each group, repeat four groups.
**Action 3: sitting posture abduction

**Action tips: * this machine is mainly used to train the muscles on the outside of thigh and buttock. First of all, adjust the counterweight piece, sit on the instrument, hold the instrument with both hands, and tilt the upper body forward. When we open our legs outward, we exhale, and when we retract, we inhale.
It should be noted here that the counterweight piece can not be completely placed at the bottom. Keep a little distance every time you do it, so that the effect is better. Then do it 15 times for each group, and repeat for four groups.

Is such a goddess your favorite type? If you have any idea, you can leave a message in the comment area**

entry.title: A famous American blogger, who dislikes his body and loses more than 200 pounds in six months, is very inspirational
entry.content:
In fact, many things in life are fair. If you want anything, you should rely on your own efforts to fight for it. For example, if you want a good-looking body, you should try to find a suitable way to lose weight and make your body slim; If you want to have profound knowledge, you should read more books and arm your mind. In fact, sports and reading are the same, need to adhere to day after day, in order to achieve the desired effect.

Kelly Roberts is a female runner, and is very well-known in the United States. She is also a blogger and freelance writer. She works very hard in her daily life and often shares her weight loss stories with everyone. The reason for losing weight is that she finds that with the growth of age, her weight is more and more higher than the normal level. She sees that she is covered with fat in the mirror, and her legs are very thick, which makes him feel very inferior. Especially after her brother died, she had weighed more than 200 pounds in six months. She knew that she had to lose weight and change her lifestyle.

In the process of losing weight, Kelly found a suitable exercise, that is running. In Kelly’s opinion, everyone’s way of losing weight is different. She likes to struggle every morning and then motivate herself with a big goal. People ask when it will be easier to lose weight, and she says never. In fact, the reason why Kelly chose the way of running is to let her lose weight without fear, eliminate some anxiety and insecurity. At the same time, she will also cooperate with a healthy diet, because only a healthy diet can have real beauty.

Kelly once shared that as long as you remember that nothing is impossible, in fact, many things are not as bad as you think, because you can always find opportunities to work hard for your goals. Don’t always focus on what you want to change. In fact, every day is a new opportunity. You just need to start.
There are always some things in life that seem very difficult, but as long as you start the first step and stick to it, it’s not as difficult as you think. You can adapt to it slowly.
Here are four recommended exercises to help you start the journey of losing weight.
Action 1: standing side leg lift

Action tips * : stand on the ground with both legs apart and shoulder width, keep the whole body upright, tighten the abdomen, put both hands on the waist, lift the right leg, exhale, lift the right leg to the right, tighten the hips, inhale and relax, move the right foot to the left, keep the toes lifted off the ground all the time, make 20 left and right as a group, repeat for 4 groups.
*Action 2: move squat

Action tips * : first, stand on the ground with legs together, two arms naturally placed on both sides of the body, then keep the left leg still, step out the right leg to the right, inhale, bend the hips back, and do a squat, with hands clenched in front of the chest, exhale and stand straight, retract the right leg, and then repeat the same action on the left side. Do 30 in one group and repeat for 4 groups.
*Action 3: breaststroke squat

Action tips: first, stand on the ground with legs separated, toes turned outward, heels opposite, arms bent, hands clasped in front of the chest, then open the knees to the outside, aim at the position of toes, inhale, squat, exhale and stand straight. Make 20 in one group and repeat for 4 groups.
Action 4: lie on your side and lift your legs

**Action essentials * *: lateral position, lower arm bending, elbows close to the ground, big arm vertical support body, tighten abdomen, exhale, upper buttocks tighten, legs up, inhale and fall, 15 left and right, repeat 4 groups
Remember the killer is not too cold, the little girl asked the killer, life is always so difficult? It’s just like when I was a kid. The killer replied, always. Yes, there is nothing that is very easy to get. If it is so easy, it may not feel very precious and will not cherish. Just like losing weight, if we can easily lose weight, we can easily get fat. So the process of losing weight may also be difficult, but if we adapt to it, and because this process has the results we want, we will cherish it.

entry.title: 170kg to 70kg metamorphosis, New Zealand barber, successfully lose 100kg
entry.content:
If you are not satisfied with your current figure and want to change it, start now, because it’s not too late to start. On the one hand, obesity is harmful to people’s health, because it may bring some physical diseases; On the other hand, because of the obese figure, the whole person will become insecure, and if a person starts to feel inferior, then he will form a kind of bondage to himself, and there is no way to really be himself and live a wonderful life.

There is such a barber in New Zealand. Her name is Simone Anderson. In the past, she was 170 kg, belonging to a very obese group. It was precisely because of obesity that she brought great difficulties to her life and was often ridiculed by people around her. Therefore, when she was 24 years old, she firmly chose to start to lose weight, so it took her about a year to successfully lose 100 kg of fat and 70 kg.

Now she is a beauty worthy of the name. She has a high face and a good figure. She is crazy. But the weight loss success of her stomach skin is very loose, this is also because before too fat and make the skin stretch the result. So she had plastic surgery, and the surgery was very successful, and from then on Simone ushered in a new self.

Because of her persistence and change, now she has become very beautiful and confident. She not only often attends various parties, but also gains her own love, which can be said to be a winner. Simone once said that she didn’t want to go back to the way she used to be. If she wanted to be thinner, she would become thinner completely, and she would not recall how painful she was at the beginning. Although she was very painful before, she survived, just like now.
When a person relies on their own efforts to survive the difficulties in life, and let themselves become better and better, then her heart is also very strong.
Here are five simple and effective home fat reduction exercises. If you keep practicing, you will see unexpected results.
Action 1: mussel

Action tips * : lie on the sofa with your right arm bent, hold your head with your palm, bend your knees, keep your lower legs still, exhale, shrink your upper buttocks, drive your buttocks outward, inhale and restore, 15 left and 15 right, 4 groups.
*Action 2: single leg back arm flexion and extension

Action essentials * : first sit on the stool, tighten the abdomen, straighten the waist and back, put both hands on both sides of the body, hold the stool firmly, move the hips forward, and suspend the body. Inhale, bend elbow, elbow joint backward, body vertically downward, raise one leg and straighten up at the same time, exhale, big arm stretch elbow joint, leg restore, one group do 12-20 alternately, rest between groups for 30 seconds, repeat 4 groups.
*Action 3: push to move left and right

Action tips * : separate hands and shoulder width, palm support on the ground, feet on the sofa, waist and abdomen tighten, so that the body is parallel to the ground, can not step on the waist and hips, tighten the abdomen to maintain body stability, and then move hands and feet to one side of the sofa, and then move to the other end, a group move back and forth 10 times, repeat 4 groups.
*Action 4: prone hip extension

Action tips * : first, lie flat on the chair, with the abdomen attached to the chair, arms straight forward, support on the ground to keep the body stable, look ahead, legs apart and hip width, exhale, buttocks tighten, legs keep straight, lift up, stretch hip joint, inhale. One group 15 times, repeat 4 groups.
*Action 5: sitting with opposite elbow touching knee

**Action tips: * sit and stand on the sofa, put both hands on your chest, raise your elbows, tighten your abdomen, tilt your upper body backward, stretch your two legs forward and take off, turn your upper body to the right, bend your right leg and lift it up, so that your left elbow can touch your right knee as much as possible, and then move your upper body to the left, bend your left leg and lift it up. Make the right elbow touch the left knee, alternate 20 in a group, repeat 4 groups.

Nowadays, with the rise of the national fitness movement, more and more young ladies and sisters who love sports have joined the ranks of fitness. However, due to people’s aesthetic differences, although there are many young sisters who do fitness, there are few people who really participate in fitness competitions. The main reason is that the domestic aesthetic is not up to that standard. And today, Xiaobian brings you this, is worthy of the name of fitness beauty.

This is our hero today. Born in 1990, she is now 30 years old. Her little sister is from Xinjiang. They all say that there are beautiful women in Xinjiang. Seeing this exotic beauty, how many men are attracted to her. And fitness has the effect of reducing age, which looks like the appearance of early 20.

Little sister is already a well-known sports blogger, and also has a certain reputation in the fitness circle. Not only that, but also she is a very professional bodybuilder besides a net star. He has won many awards. At a young age, you get a lot of titles.

At present, she is a cbba national first-class referee, fitness model, National Hip beauty champion, international professional Miss Bikini champion and other titles in one. She is really beautiful and healthy. It’s very recognizable to see her pure face. It’s hard to forget at a glance.

With the blessing of high face value, the figure is also unique. As a professional bodybuilding champion, the figure is naturally too good to say anything. Curve charming, and very in line with the domestic aesthetic, long legs, hip everything, and on the basis of hip, legs are not particularly thick, thin waist, the formation of the charming waist hip ratio, is really greedy.

A good figure is never born. It’s hard to have an enviable figure without the training. My little sister started early. When she was a student in 2008, she began to get in touch with fitness. With the increase of fitness time, she found that her figure was not what she imagined. After a bath, she looked at the poster on the wall and her figure, and felt that it was not a level at all. The figure on the poster was the one she dreamed of.

entry.title: At 53, he looks like a 30-year-old, not only a writer, but also a private fitness teacher
entry.content:
People with high face value tend to make friends more easily, especially Europeans! Their white faces, deep eye socket and high nose make them a “Pan’an style” high-value group. However, compared with Asians, their shortcoming is also the most obvious, that is, they are easier to grow old.

Next, I’d like to introduce Edson Brandao, who subverts the stereotype of Asians that they are over 50 years old. When I saw his picture, it was hard to believe that he was a 53 year old man. It seemed that he was a 30-year-old at most.

While his appearance and figure are amazing, his resume is also quite wonderful. In addition to being a famous writer, he is also a private teacher. This kind of gold-plated aura makes people curious about his daily life.

Looking at his photos on the website, you can almost find that his skin without pores is as tender as a baby. This unreasonable state of frozen age makes more and more girls become his fans. Interestingly, the more you look forward to his photos, you will find that he is even younger than he was in his 20s, and his figure and skin will be better!

It turned out that he was also a greasy middle-aged man. Looking at his swimming circle, he began to reflect on his lifestyle. As a result, he started to become a private teacher. He began to run every day, and after running, he went to do all kinds of targeted strength training. In addition, he doesn’t even relax at home. He specially bought a lot of sports equipment to keep fit at home every day.

In order to restore his body to the compactness of his youth, he also specially consulted a nutritionist and planned his diet reasonably. As time went on, he became younger and more energetic. In fact, time is fair to anyone. The best way to delay aging is to exercise.

Next, I’d like to make up for the shoulder training movements that are often done by Edson Brandao of Amway. If you want to develop strong shoulders, please follow them.
Action 1: barbell press

Action tips: * * this action is mainly to exercise our deltoid muscles. First of all, the feet should be shoulder width apart, the body should be straight, the core should be tight, the eyes should look ahead, hold the barbell, put it on our clavicle, exhale and push it up. After pushing up, keep the elbow slightly bent. Inhale, put the barbell down, repeat 15 times in each group, do four groups.
**Action 2: upright rowing with barbell

Action tips: * * this action is mainly to train our deltoid muscles in front and middle. First, stand up straight, tighten the core, look forward with both eyes, hold the barbell, and hold the distance of the hand as wide as the shoulder.
Here’s a little trick, which is that we need to lean forward a little bit. Pull the barbell to the same height as the shoulder when exerting force. Then stop for a second. Then put down the barbell naturally and drop it to the original position. Do it 12 times in each group and repeat for four groups.
**Action 3: dumbbell bends over the bird

**Action essentials * *: this action is mainly to exercise our deltoid muscles. First of all, our feet are the same width as our hips, our knees are slightly bent, our body is bent, and our core is tight.
Hold the dumbbell well with both hands, lift the dumbbell up when exerting force, stop for a second when reaching the top, and then put it down naturally. Each group was done twelve times and four groups were repeated.

entry.title: Born in 1999, she became popular because of her beautiful buttocks. She has a concave convex body curve. How can she do it
entry.content:
With the popularity of small video platform, more and more people will share personal life videos and photos on it. Especially recently, fitness has become a hot topic. Many women with good figure will share their experience on these platforms. However, the core of these experiences is the word “persistence”. If you want to have a good figure, you can’t be lazy.

There is an American girl in 1999, Daisy Keech, who became popular all over the Internet because she shared her good figure on the platform. She not only has a tight body curve, but also has an unparalleled high face value, which makes her popularity continue to rise.

You know, she’s only 21 years old this year, and at such a young age, she has won the favor of famous brands. Business partners like fashio Nova clothing and bangenergy drinks are also emerging in an endless stream, and she also gets a lot of commission.

The first sight of daily Keech is impressive. She has a pair of big eyes and an S-shaped body curve. This kind of high-quality body curve not only makes female fans adore, but also makes many male fans feel inferior.

As a public figure, there must be all kinds of so-called black materials. She was coaxed by some good people because she only got the tilt of platform resources and gained high popularity by making friends with the rich second generation. But daily Keech has been unmoved, trying to exercise and protect his privacy. This is a good example of being upright and not afraid of the shadow.

However, there are rumors that she is very concerned about. Some netizens doubt that her figure is not real, but obtained by medical means. This makes her feel very angry, after all, she has the body today is also her unremitting efforts to exercise day and night to get, are deserved.

In order to prove her innocence, she specially asked the doctor to identify her, which also made her the first buttock that has been verified by experts in the world. How on earth did she develop such a hot figure?
If you want to have a hip up sister, let’s share a set of hip training actions!
Action 1: dumbbell high hip Bridge

Action tips: * dumbbell high hip bridge is mainly to end to our hip muscle, hip small partner must not miss.
First of all, we need to prepare a dumbbell, as much weight as possible, because our feet should be on the dumbbell, so the support surface needs to be larger, then the body is on the yoga mat, the hands are supported on the side of the body, the heels of the feet are on the dumbbell, the hips are raised up, and exhale at the same time. Stop for a second when you reach the highest point, then slowly fall down and inhale at the same time. Repeat four groups, 15 times in each group.
**Action 2: dumbbell squat

Action tips: * dumbbell squat exercise to our legs can also stimulate the buttocks. It’s a very good training move. We can choose a heavier dumbbell, and then double the width of the feet, shoulder width, toes out. Back straight, keep the core tight, squat, knee to toe direction, at the same time inhale, put the dumbbell close to the ground, and then squat again, do exhale when squatting, repeat 15 times in each group, do four groups.
**Action 3: spring circle squat jump

**Action Essentials: * the spring circle squat jump is a high-intensity training action. If you want to burn fat, you can practice more. This action consumes a lot of calories. First of all, we put the elastic hoop on our thighs, then open our feet to make the elastic hoop have a certain amount of elasticity, straighten our back and do a squat. entry.title: Comprehensive analysis of back training, 5 back movements, which one do you like best
entry.content:
The back is the part that we must practice in the process of fitness. If we practice the back well, we can add points to our figure. The inverted triangle figure is always so charming, but it’s not so easy to practice the back well.

Many people don’t know how to match when they practice back. In fact, back training needs stimulation from multiple angles, because there are too many muscles in the back. When you practice back, which action do you feel most?

Which of the following five back movements do you like best?
1. Barbell hard pull
Technically speaking, it can not only exercise back muscles, it can exercise the whole back watch chain of our body, but it is absolutely the best choice for the whole back exercise.

The skill of hard pull is very important, but once you master the standard action, you can pull a lot of weight, which can drive more muscles, release muscle growth hormone, and help you increase muscle strength.
2. Wide grip pull up
It’s a great way to exercise your back, and pulling up is the best. Wide grip pull-up is very suitable for latissimus dorsi training. Although the narrow grip can give you more range of motion, the wide grip is more suitable for joint position, and the upward pull of the wide grip can exercise the back muscles more deeply.

Wide range pull-up is a big challenge for Xiaobai, because it requires strong back strength. For better back muscle enhancement, each group should do 8-12 times.
3. T-bar rowing
Choose T-bar rowing, because this action can pull more weight and stimulate the deep rhomboid muscle, but if the amount of training is too large, it may use the lower back to borrow strength.

The posture of this movement is not squat. You need to keep the knee at a locked angle, and then through the position and width of the hand, wide grip can concentrate more strength on latissimus dorsi, while the opposite grip can concentrate more strength on the middle of the back (rhomboid, teres minor and trapezius).
4. Rowing with wide grip
Sitting rowing is mainly focused on the back in training. Many people usually use V-shaped grip to practice. If you change to the straight bar and wide grip, the effect may be different. Because it changes the strength center of your latissimus dorsi.

Wide grip rowing imitates some back training instruments, and the way of holding or training times have changed. Don’t train with both. It can also be done in the way of general grip strength. The elbow joint is close to both sides of the body, and the strength will be more concentrated in the middle of the back.
5. Single arm dumbbell rowing
It’s a good one-sided training move, each side is trained independently, which ensures you can pull more weight. When you are training on one side, your range of motion will be larger. If your weaker side is exhausted first, you will not be limited. In addition, this movement can also strengthen the weaker side, and practice the two hands separately.

You can also put one hand on the bench to better support your body. A slight rotation of the trunk allows greater activity of the “core” muscles.
Of course, today is not a simple fight who is the champion, you need to know, from the difficulty of movement, the number of stimulated muscles, the uniqueness of training, to re organize back training, these five back training movements can let you know more about the shortcomings of your training system, so as to improve your training movements and movement arrangement.
In other words, if you want to train the perfect back muscles, you need to stimulate them from different angles, because there are many muscles in the back. Don’t train one or two movements, the effect will be very poor. Well, that’s all for today’s content. I like one click triple connection.

entry.title: Fitness can not only practice their favorite parts, mainly to the whole body coordination, can not fall weak parts
entry.content:
Everyone has more or less weak muscle groups, some people’s chest muscles are weak, some people’s shoulders are not wide, some people’s arms are not good, and so on. If we don’t carry out targeted training for weak muscle groups, it will affect our physique. Today, I’d like to give you a detailed introduction to “weak points” and how to improve them.

Weak points
“Weak point” refers to the strength defect caused by the backward development of a certain muscle group in compound movements; From the physical point of view, it shows a weak muscle group. And * * isolated action and auxiliary action * * can improve this situation.

For the purpose of muscle hypertrophy
From the perspective of muscle hypertrophy, the weak point refers to the “underdevelopment” phenomenon of a certain muscle group in the body.
In many cases, weak spots are caused by genes. For example, you may be born with a narrow chest and a wide pelvis, which requires more effort in the development of shoulder and leg muscles to reduce the “narrow” feeling of the body and achieve the “X” shape. Most of the time, you make up for your inborn weakness by trying to make your muscles bigger.
However, the weak points are also acquired. For example, sometimes your body structure may not be suitable for doing certain movements, and if you insist on taking these movements as the focus of training, it is not only easy to get injured, but also not the best choice for muscle hypertrophy.
Physical weakness is often caused by the way the action is performed. When doing push down movements, some muscles of the trainer’s back may not get any stimulation, or the biceps brachii may become the fastest growing part. In a similar situation, the trainer may need to adjust the grip distance, angle, and movement variation to find a more suitable method of action execution.
Good movement quality is very important for training. According to the research findings, as a complex action that requires the cooperation of multiple muscle groups and joints, a muscle group is not in place due to muscle activation, which may lead to unbalanced muscle development.

For the purpose of absolute power
Strength lifters will also have a “weak link in the chain” in a certain movement. For example, the trainer may be able to pull more weight with the help belt. So this shows that the grip strength is the factor limiting the hard pull strength of the trainer. But increasing the hard pull (training more frequently, or increasing the hard pull capacity) is not the best way to improve grip strength. On the contrary, the best way to improve grip strength is to add grip strength training in daily hard pull training.
This situation is one of the countless problems that strength lifters may encounter. The way to solve this problem is to add non three major movements in training. If only training three movements, it is easy to cause the imbalance of muscle development, resulting in the lack of training capacity. Adding non three auxiliary movements to make up for the lack of training capacity can exercise muscles in a balanced way, so that there is no “weak point” in the movement of strength lift.
However, when the trainer is faced with some special circumstances (such as injuries, etc.), the training plan needs to be adjusted accordingly. According to the individual differences and the training period, the proportion of auxiliary movements in the total capacity can fluctuate between 25% and 50%.
The above content comes from the book muscle and strength: building a complete body-building knowledge system with rigorous science

entry.title: Disliked by her boyfriend, she lost 40 kg in five months. Before and after she lost weight, it was very different
entry.content:
In modern society, thin is the beauty, so slim body is the pursuit of most people, whether men or women, want their appearance to be very beautiful, and weight loss is not only because they want to have a slim body, but also to make their body more healthy, because obesity will cause a series of diseases, So it’s very important to lose weight. The little sister below is very inspirational. She lost 40 kilograms in five months. She is really a weight loss expert.

Her name is Peggy. The two pictures above are all about her, but I can’t imagine that she is the same person. Peggy likes to eat junk food very much from childhood, which leads to her obesity. However, when she was a child, she didn’t care about her obesity. Even if people around her mocked him, she would laugh it off and live a very optimistic life. This kind of sunny attitude is very good, but it can’t change other people’s views on her.

There is a reason for any change in a person. Although Peggy never cared about her fat appearance before, until she met her boyfriend, all her changes were due to her boyfriend’s ugly words. When Peggy meets her boyfriend, Peggy’s weight is in the highest state, about 150 kg. Her weight has exceeded twice that of normal people. Although she doesn’t mind at all, she is despised by her boyfriend. This is the first time that she begins to realize that she can’t be so fat any more and must start to change. So with the encouragement of her family, she successfully lost 40 kg of fat in 5 months in a healthy way, got rid of her boyfriend who judged people by their appearance, and successfully completed her gorgeous transformation.

In fact, most of the time, we only need a motivation to take the first step of change and persist in it. We will find that our persistence and efforts are meaningful and we can gain a completely different self. The following five groups of fat reduction training can help you build a good figure.
Today, I’d like to recommend a home-based training program for you to get in shape at home.
Action 1: hip bridge on stool

Action tips * : lie on the stool above the shoulder blade, the whole body is parallel to the ground, the knees are bent, the two lower legs are vertical to the ground, and they are shoulder width apart, the soles of the feet step on the ground, the arms cross and stick to the chest, exhale, the buttock muscles tighten, lift up, inhale slowly and relax downward, do 12-15 in one group, rest 30 seconds between groups, repeat 4-6 groups.
*Action 2: Bulgarian squat

Action tips * : first of all, keep the body upright, stand on the ground, tighten the abdomen, put the right leg on the stool, keep the left leg motionless, put both hands on the waist, keep the upper body upright, inhale, bend the knees, squat down vertically, exhale, force the buttocks and legs to restore the upper body upright. Make 12 left and right as a group, rest between groups for 30-45 seconds, repeat 4 groups.
*Action 3: leg raising in sitting position

Action tips * : sit on the stool, hold the edge of the stool with both hands, straighten the legs forward, lean the upper body backward, tighten the abdomen, exhale, push the abdominal muscles to lift the legs upward, and move the upper body forward to make the abdominal muscles contract to the maximum extent, then inhale, stretch the legs downward, lean the body backward, lengthen the abdominal muscles, 12-15 in each group, and rest for 30 seconds, Repeat 4 groups.
*Action 4: lift your leg after push up

Action essentials * : separate your hands and shoulder width, support on the ground, put your feet on the stool, tighten the core, make the body into a plane, don’t collapse the waist, don’t raise your hips, the whole body is parallel to the ground, tighten the abdomen to keep the body stable, and then inhale, extend the right leg downward first, exhale, and then lift it upward, extend to the left, until it extends beyond the left leg. Make a group of 10 left and right, rest 30-45 seconds between groups, repeat 4 groups.
*Action 5: bend and extend the back arm on the stool

**Action essentials * *: first sit on the stool, tighten the abdomen, straighten the waist and back, put both hands on both sides of the body, hold the stool firmly, move the hips forward, and suspend the body. Inhale, bend elbow, elbow joint backward, body vertically downward, exhale, big arm stretch elbow joint, one group do 12-15, rest between groups for 30 seconds, repeat 4 groups.

In fact, he used to be a swimmer, then gradually transformed into a model, and then became a singer. This transformation of legend level is also enviable. He can be said to be a pop singer with model level figure.

His identity is not only that, he is also a little famous photographer in the world. At present, his main focus is on fashion photography, and he is favored by international brands because of his long-term immersion research. He has also shot works for “Jalouse art fashion” and “Elle world fashion garden”, which shows his excellence.

As a 54 year old person, he has to pay a price to maintain this frozen age. Chen chuanduo once said that if he wants to reverse the growth, he must maintain in advance, and work hard on diet and fitness.

It can be said that fitness is the only way to keep young. Do you want to have Chen chuanduo’s figure? If you want to, just look at the following training moves, which Chen chuanduo often does!
Move one, stand dumbbell alternate front flat

Action tips: * * this action is mainly to exercise our deltoid muscles.
Prepare a pair of dumbbells with proper weight, open both feet, tighten the core, keep your eyes in front, keep your body in a neutral position, and hold the dumbbells tightly with both hands. Raise the dumbbell on one side to shoulder height, then put it down.
Do the same thing with the other hand. Keep your mind moving in unison and feel the power of the muscles in the anterior deltoid. Exhale when lifting, inhale when falling slowly, 20 times in each group, repeat four groups.
**Action 2: standing dumbbell side lift

Action tips: * this action is mainly to exercise our deltoid middle bundle. First of all, you need to prepare a pair of dumbbells, and the weight should be within your own range. Then open your feet naturally, stand up straight and keep neutral. Tighten the core and look forward with both eyes.
Exhale and lift the dumbbell to shoulder height. Stop for a while and then slowly put it down. Inhale as you fall. The whole process to feel our deltoid in the bundle of force, each group do 15 times, repeat four groups.
**Action 3: dumbbell press in sitting position

**Action tips: * sitting dumbbell press pays more attention to exercise our deltoid anterior bundle. Of course, it also involves deltoid middle bundle, but it is only a small part. First of all, you need to prepare a pair of dumbbells with moderate weight, and then sit on the dumbbell stool. Keep the body in neutral position, sink the shoulder blades and tighten the core. Look ahead with both eyes.
Hold the dumbbell with both hands, palm forward, keep the forearm and forearm vertical. Exhale, lift the dumbbell to the top of the head, keep the arm slightly bent, and then inhale to slowly drop the dumbbell. Repeat 12 times, four groups.

Today, I’ll introduce 6 shoulder muscle strengthening exercises to make you have a perfect spherical shoulder.
Action 1: barbell neck back press

Action tips: first, open your legs and stand on the ground, keep the distance between your feet and shoulder width; Then hold the roots of both sides of the barbell with both hands, bend both arms, and make the bar of the barbell stick to the neck; The last two arms straight up, shoulder force, will barbell over the head. 15 times a group, 4 groups.
Action 2: barbell neck press

Action tips: stand on the ground with legs apart and shoulder width, hold the barbell root with both hands, and put the barbell on the lower jaw, then straighten both hands, shoulder force, and lift the barbell over the top of the head. Make 12 groups, make 4 groups.
Action 3: upright rowing with barbell

Action tips: first, stand on the ground with both legs, keep the body upright, then hold one third of the barbell with two hands separately, extend the arm downward, and then push the shoulder, bend the two arms, and lift them upward until the forearm, the big arm and the barbell are in a straight line. In groups of 13, do 4.
Action 4: standing dumbbell side lift

Action tips: the body is vertical to the ground, two arms naturally droop, two hands hold two dumbbells respectively, and then, two arms move along the arc on both sides. Until both arms are straight and parallel to the ground. 10 in a group, do 4 groups.
Action 5: alternate standing dumbbell with flat lift

Action tips: stand on the ground, hold a dumbbell in both hands, and keep the arms drooping naturally; Then extend the left arm forward until it is parallel to the ground. Then drop the left arm and lift the right arm. Repeat the same action. Make 10 groups, make 4 groups.
Action 6: bend over dumbbell bird

Action tips: stand on the ground with legs slightly bent, upper body bent forward, two hands holding a dumbbell, palms opposite, and then extend both arms to both sides at the same time, until the two arms and upper body are parallel to the ground. 10 in a group, do 4 groups.

entry.title: Fitness three major, hard pull, push, squat, fitness new or old gun can not pass
entry.content:
“Three major events” – hard pull, bench push and squat, which are regarded as the representative training methods of pull, push and squat, will not be missed by either new fitness person or old fitness gun.
The three major events are also often regarded as the symbols of strength, and they are used as the main events in strength lifting training and muscle hypertrophy training. Therefore, these three movements and their variations will be involved in the training plan for muscle hypertrophy and strength.

Let’s take the simplest routine strength training plan as an example to analyze what a strength oriented training plan should be.

Monday: 5 × 5 (5 times in each group, 5 groups each time). The rest of the rope is pressed down 3 × 8-12 (3 times in each group, 8-12 groups each time). I’ll go boating 3 × 8~12
-The recumbent push will train the chest muscle, deltoid anterior bundle and triceps brachii.
-Rope down will train the latissimus dorsi, pectoralis and triceps brachii.
-Rowing involves the latissimus dorsi, constrictor scapulae, biceps brachii and posterior deltoid.
Tuesday: squat / hard pull 5 × 5, Romanian hard pull / front squat 4 × 6
-Squat and pull every other week.
-In the week of squatting, do Romanian hard pulls (RDLs); In the week of hard pull, do the front squat.
-On this day, you will basically practice the whole lower body (including the upper back and lower back to a certain extent): gluteus maximus, hamstring, quadriceps, and under the stimulation of squat, only the lower leg may not be practiced (but if you are a strength lifter, then don’t care about the lower leg).

Thursday: 5 × 3. Over recommendation 4 × 6. Weight bearing (if necessary) pull up 3 × 6
-The recumbent push trains the chest, deltoid and triceps.
-Over press will train deltoid and triceps.
-Weight bearing pull-up will train latissimus dorsi, posterior triceps and biceps brachii.
Friday: hard pull / squat 5 × 3, squat / hard pull 4 × 6
-The training content of this day is similar to that of Tuesday, but there are some changes in the sequence, number of groups and times of action. So if you squat on Tuesday, pull on Friday; If you pull hard on Tuesday, do a squat on Friday.
-Hard pull and Romanian hard pull will train to the waist.

The main purpose of this project is to increase the strength of the three major events and the whole body. All the “main action” are no more than 6 times, and auxiliary action is generally in the range of 8 ~ 12 times. About 3 / 4 of the training capacity is arranged in the main event, and 1 / 4 of the training capacity is arranged in the auxiliary action with more times.
Among them, there are 9 groups of squat and hip hinge movements (including Romanian hard pull and forward squat), which are less than the recommended 10 groups, but the main movements used to increase strength are basically close to the minimum recommended capacity. In addition, some actions that can better train the middle deltoid and triceps brachii are added to make up for the defect that recumbent push can only train the pectoral muscle, anterior deltoid and triceps brachii.
In addition, there are 9 groups of the capacity of downward pressure, rowing and pull-up, which also does not reach the recommended number of groups. However, you need to keep your shoulder blades tight and your lumbar spine extended when you do a hard pull. Secondly, in the hard pull and squat will also be the whole back together to practice. Finally, anyone who’s done a squat with a little weight knows that it depends on the muscles of the upper back.
Therefore, when writing the strength lifting plan, don’t deliberately let each muscle group be directly trained to at least 10 groups. As long as the capacity is almost within the recommended range, and there is a certain space for overlapping movements, then the training plan is no problem.
The above content comes from the book muscle and strength: building a complete body-building knowledge system with rigorous science

Four legged support, elastic hoop in the middle of the thigh, core tightening, one leg start force, lift the leg to the side, to the top of a second, and then slowly down, each group do 15 times, do 4 groups.

Hold hands together, elastic loop in the middle of thighs, body left side step, and then the other leg up, and then the body right step, repeat action, 20 times each group, do 4 groups.
Action 3 elastic circle half squat hip abduction

Elastic loop in the legs, squatting posture, and then the legs outward, a little stay, to feel the power of the buttocks, 20 times in each group, repeat 4 groups.
The elastic circle plays a very important role in the process of fitness. It can be carried with you and does not take up space. Moreover, the training effect is also very good. Especially when it is tight, you need to control it with more force, which will double the training effect. It is very necessary to prepare an elastic circle.

entry.title: How to increase muscle bottleneck period to do Try these five training methods to make your muscle gain free
entry.content:
Our muscles are very smart, but when you try to make your muscles bigger than before, you need to be stronger than before.

In order to build more muscles, you need to have a better understanding of how your muscles work. In most cases, we choose random and more intensive training as a tool to stimulate muscle growth, ignoring how and why muscles grow.
Many small partners will worry that they will reach the bottleneck after training to a certain extent, and the speed of muscle growth will slow down or even not grow much. Today, we summarize five principles for your reference.

1. Always change some training details
No matter how interesting your training style is, your body will adapt quickly, and as a result, your muscles will stop building. If you repeat the same training all the time, your muscles will quickly adapt to your training method. In other words, the muscle stops growing. Many people think that their success is because they do it again with a certain weight, or five pounds more than they used to. But if that’s the only way you use it, it won’t work.

Every exercise tries to change some details: the number of repetitions in each group, the contraction time of the muscles, the weight used, the rest time between groups, the order and type of exercise, so that your muscles know what your goal is.
2. Give the muscles enough space to adapt
This principle seems to contradict the former one, but it is not. It’s like the relationship between yin and Yang. You need to put enough pressure on the muscles to stimulate growth, but you have to let them repair themselves. Because muscles only grow when they’re resting.

Don’t ignore it, or you’ll drain yourself. Whether you want better exercise, more strength or better form, you need to arrange the recovery process in training, otherwise you will never be able to maximize muscle growth.
3. Don’t neglect diet
Rest is a necessary condition for muscle growth, and proper nutrition is one of the most important factors for muscle growth. Everything you eat provides the raw material for muscle growth. We can give you a precise recipe, the time and quantity of each meal, but we won’t do it. All you have to do is eat enough food.

Although the “synthesis window” after training has been controversial, it is still a good time. Take in some easily absorbed protein. Of course, in your own diet, arrange enough healthy nutrition every day. Exercise at least 3-4 times a week, every part of the body needs to practice, 3 months for a fitness program.
4. After a while, you need to change your movements

Muscles are very smart, they will know what you want to do soon, that is, they will adapt quickly. You can change some small details every day while keeping most of the details unchanged, but after 6-8 weeks, the muscles will adapt. That’s why it changes a lot every 6-8 weeks. It’s hard because you need to change and learn something new, which is the best way.
5. Do self weight training first
An effective way to stimulate muscle growth is to train with your own weight. In the process, if you don’t lift your weight, you also need to use some muscles to stabilize your weight and body. These stable muscles are important tissues to help you stay strong and healthy and to help you avoid injury. When you train with equipment, the effect is different.

After warming up, the first step is weight training. This is the most important thing you have to do. For example, push ups are a good self weight training movement. Fixed equipment is used as a follow-up supplementary training to increase some training ability or achieve your specific goal.
If you want to get a better effect of muscle enhancement training, you need to constantly find different training skills, constantly strengthen training, and find your own actions to break through. In this way, you will make faster progress. OK, that’s all for today’s sharing. If you like our content, remember to press one button three times.

entry.title: How to shape 3D shoulder muscles Share 6 effective and practical deltoid training moves
entry.content:
Why is the shoulder so narrow? Many people feel that their shoulders are not wide enough, so they want to improve their shoulder muscles. But there are many ways to improve their shoulder muscles. I don’t know which one you are best at? Today, let’s talk about the five movements of shoulder training. Which one do you like best?

1. Sitting dumbbell press
If you can only choose one way to exercise your shoulders, then this movement is a good choice. Some people may think that barbells work better because the bar moves from the front of the body to the top of the head, which recruits deltoid forearms to complete the action.

On the contrary, the dumbbell press can apply tension to the plane above the shoulder instead of the inclined plane. This transfers part of the load into the triangle. Dumbbell recommendation needs more balance and coordination. That’s why it’s more effective.
2. Fixed instrument recommendation
Although the training effect of Smith machine is similar to that of barbell in theory, there are many devices that can increase the load and have a separate grip to complete the strength of one hand and two hands. With shoulder movement, you can move in multiple planes on these instruments.

Hummer equipment is the most common equipment, many fitness enthusiasts found that these machines can be better than Smith’s machine, can stimulate deltoid muscle more comprehensively. You just need to keep the core of your body stable, because it doesn’t need to control stability, so you can focus on stimulating the deltoids.
3. Dumbbell side lift
Although compound exercise is a necessary condition to increase shoulder circumference, it is difficult for you to develop strong deltoid muscle if you don’t exercise the middle bundle of deltoid muscle. The side lift is aimed at the middle bundle of deltoid muscle, and the training effect is very good.

When doing the dumbbell side lift, it is recommended not to put the dumbbell at the lowest position, but to keep a certain angle with the body, so that the middle bundle of deltoid can continue to contract, and the effect is better. Under the standard action, it is recommended that each group do 8-12 times.
4. Rope side lift
Although the dumbbell is a very practical and effective instrument, it is not obvious in the arc line training, especially in the bending and side lift training. At the beginning of the training, the dumbbell only provides a small amount of resistance.

Instead, the rope solves the limit of free weight, which provides continuous tension throughout. Usually, the most common problem with rope side lift is that it’s too close to the gantry, which makes it difficult to find tension at the beginning of the action, and you can’t even get all the important resistance.
There are two ways to get sustained tension: one is to stand far away from the dragon’s gate, so when you start to move, you already feel a certain degree of tension; Another way is to hold the gantry with one hand and tilt your body slightly. These two methods can improve your training efficiency.
5. Dumbbell slant board bird
If you don’t practice the deltoid posterior bundle well, then your deltoid will not feel perfect, because the deltoid posterior bundle is also very important to us. It makes our deltoids look more solid and full.

The best way to get the deltoid back is the dumbbell ramp bird, which can easily make the movement more stable and standard, so you will find that when you do this movement, the dumbbell will be lighter than standing and prone. You do this in isolation. You don’t have to practice with heavy weight. We try to do it 12-15 times in each group, and the effect will be better.
6. Reverse flying bird of butterfly machine
There is no doubt that dumbbells are an excellent tool for training shoulders, especially for all types of side lifts. But for some small partners, it is difficult to master the correct method. The correct method can accurately obtain muscle contraction and stimulation, especially in the posterior bundle of deltoid muscle.

There are many handlebars in the butterfly machine. We can try different handlebars to see which one is more suitable for us. We can also try to practice with one hand, because our body can be stable and we can rely on cushions. When we do this action, our elbow joint can be kept unchanged as much as possible. If we move the elbow joint, we may rely on the arm to exert force.

One Friday training program, scientific muscle, save time, less detours!

entry.title: If you want to have a good effect on muscle hypertrophy, don't change the training movements frequently
entry.content:
In the muscle hypertrophy training, some trainers like to change the training action frequently, while others will knock on one action. But in fact, these two training methods may not be able to achieve the ideal muscle effect. So the question is, how should we choose the right training method? Let’s take a look at Dr. Eric Helms, author of the book of muscles and strength, researcher of New Zealand Institute of performance and nsca-cscs, on this issue.

Unfamiliar movements are less effective for muscle hypertrophy
In the world of bodybuilding training, many people would suggest changing movements after a period of training, so as to keep the muscles adapting and growing. Many bodybuilders call it “muscle fusion” and take it as one of the core contents of training. But in reality, from some angles, the situation is just the opposite. When you are not proficient in a certain movement, the effect of muscle augmentation will become worse.
When training new movements (especially complex movements), the initial strength growth mainly (but not all) comes from * * neuromuscular adaptability * . Only when the movement technique is mastered, can the trainer expose the muscle to gradual overload to achieve the effect of muscle hypertrophy effectively. Therefore, even if your training goal is to increase muscle, you also need to have a relatively high degree of proficiency in your training movements to achieve a good training effect.
On the other hand, if you keep changing training movements, you may never be able to master any of them. On the contrary, it will make training inefficient.

*A certain degree of diversity is important**
Although the effect of unfamiliar movements on muscle hypertrophy is poor, it is not to say that changing training movements has no value at all. In fact, the diversity of training movements is very important to improve the efficiency of muscle hypertrophy, but ensuring the diversity of movements is different from confusing muscles, and the premise is to master the training movements skillfully.
In the training movement, each compound movement needs a lot of different joint and muscle cooperation. However, doing this compound action directly may not be the best choice for training every muscle group used. This is like pulling a chain, where it breaks must be the weakest link.
Therefore, there is a weak muscle group when doing a compound action, which may become a factor restricting strength. Therefore, by doing some auxiliary actions, to ensure a more balanced and comprehensive development of muscles, and not because a muscle is weak, and affect the strength. This is very important in terms of absolute strength and muscle hypertrophy.

Automatic adjustment action selection
In any training, the trainer needs to clearly understand “what action is more suitable for his body”, and automatically adjust the action selection, so that the training effect will be twice the result with half the effort.
If your training goal is muscle hypertrophy, the main compound movements should allow you to judge your progress speed (at least an upper limb push, an upper limb pull, a squat, and a hip hinge movement), and at least maintain several medium cycles or even a large cycle in the training; The isolated action can be switched between training day and training day, or between medium cycle and medium cycle.
For more details about muscle and strength, please pay attention to the book muscle and strength: building a complete body-building knowledge system with rigorous science.

entry.title: It's not just relaxing. It helps you adjust to your best
entry.content:
Pre competition weight reduction is a common strategy, which is often used not only by strength lifters and Olympic weightlifters, but also in other events, such as triathlon, track and field, endurance competition, etc. as long as it is carried out in a single day, this strategy can be used.

Pre competition weight reduction means using the method of reducing training capacity to achieve the effect of reducing fatigue and improving potential (fitness), which will be directly reflected in sports performance. The pre game reduction is very similar to the reduction mentioned before, but they have different purposes.
The goal of reduction is usually to continue to make progress by reducing fatigue.
The purpose of pre competition weight reduction is to make athletes reach the best sports state on competition day. This process is also called “sprint”
**How to reduce the weight before the competition
When there is about one to four weeks to go before the game, reduce the weight before the game. The specific length of the pre competition reduction period should be determined according to the length of the overload cycle and your accumulated fatigue level.
During the pre competition period, reduce the training capacity by at least 13 and at most 23.
During the pre competition tapering period, the training intensity remains unchanged, or only slightly decreases (no more than 10% decrease). Or, if you use a longer pre race reduction period (3-4 weeks), the training intensity can be increased slightly as part of the linear cycle plan of “reduced capacity, increased intensity”.

When the competition is about to begin, the reduction of training capacity can also be achieved through a direct rest one to three days before the competition.
However, some studies have shown that a relatively easy “preparation training” in 24-48 hours before the competition may further help sports performance. Therefore, it is better to have a training with very low capacity and RPE one or two days before the competition.
The above way is one of the most effective ways to reduce the amount before the game based on the current scientific research, which can let you play to the maximum potential on the day of the game.

Here is an example of a simple pre competition weight reduction scheme for a strength lifter. Suppose that the athlete starts to reduce weight two weeks before the competition.
Reference example of pre competition reduction
When there are still two weeks to go before the competition, start to arrange the three major events in some training days, and try to refer to the competition order (squat, bench push and hard pull). Use low frequency (1-3 times) training, but keep the intensity at the weight you usually use when doing 4-6 times (75% - 85% of 1RM). By doing so, you can maintain the intensity of your training without losing strength, and at the same time speed up your recovery through low RPE. In addition, by concentrating the three events on the same day, the training frequency of each main event is directly increased, which not only increases the specificity of the competition, but also prevents the training capacity from decreasing too fast due to the decrease of the number of times.
Reduce the number of times in each group to reduce the main movement capacity by 50% ~ 70%.
Continue with the auxiliary action, but halve the number of groups for all actions.
RM: the ultimate power of times

In the small cycle with 2 weeks to go, try to lift the handle weight. What it means here is to simulate the start of the game on the Saturday before the game. At this time, the RPE will generally reach 7.5 ~ 8.5.
The same content of training should be carried out in the week of the competition and the week before the competition, but the last training should be carried out 1-2 days before the competition. The main action only needs to be carried out once to reach 4-5 RPE. Do not do any other actions including auxiliary actions. In addition, the last “training day” of this week does not exist, because this training day is your competition day.
RPE: subjective feeling
Finally, don’t forget the importance of weight selection in the competition. If you are not rational, no matter how well you do in training and pre match reduction, you may “step on thunder” on match day.
If you want to know more about efficient fitness, please refer to the book muscle and strength: building a complete body-building knowledge system with rigorous science.

Xiaobian share with you a set of effective fitness movements, we must adhere to exercise Oh!
Action 1: push up
**

*Action tips: * find a higher position, which can be a box or a stool. We have to do the action is up push ups, this action is much simpler than the push ups on the ground, is a step back method.
Hold your hands on the chair, then keep the core tight and your hands bent down. Inhale at the same time, feel the force of chest muscle when the body reaches the lowest point, and then exhale to push the body up, 12 times in each group, repeat four groups.
*Action 2: dumbbell flat bed push

**
Action tips: * this action is mainly to train our pectoralis major. Both boys and girls need to practice, because this muscle is too important for us.
Hold the dumbbell with both hands, then lie on the bench and keep the core tight. When the dumbbell is put down, inhale. When it reaches the lowest point, feel the stretching of the pectoral muscle. Then push the dumbbell up and rely on our pectoral muscle to work. When we push it up, exhale. Each group was done 12 times, and four groups were repeated.
*Action 3: oblique dumbbell push
*

**Action tips: * the main exercise of oblique dumbbell horizontal push is the upper part of our pectoralis major muscle. The muscle of this part will make your whole pectoralis become very good-looking and full.
We need to adjust the angle of the bench to about 45 degrees to the ground. Hold the dumbbell with both hands, keep the core stable, and inhale under the dumbbell. At the lowest point, our pectoralis major will stretch. Then we push the dumbbell up and exhale. After pushing up, keep the elbow slightly bent, do not completely straighten, do 12 times in each group, repeat four groups.

entry.title: Korean female coach Jiang Xianjing not only has a Xi Shi like face, but also a very hot figure
entry.content:
South Korea out of beauty, whether in the film and television entertainment industry, over the years has been countless times proved.
However, we all know that the so-called “beauties” seem to be pretty much the same. Even if they are not the same, as long as they are famous, they will become more and more beautiful and more similar.
Frankly speaking, it’s all due to the developed cosmetic technology in South Korea.

This is a very popular fitness coach on the Internet in South Korea in recent years, named Jiang Xianjing.
As a pilates coach, she not only has a beautiful face, but also has a perfect figure with a bee waist and buttocks, so she has gained a large number of fans on the Internet.

Really speaking, from facial features to figure, she may be regarded as a thorough “artificial beauty”.
But is “artificial” really bad?
It is the pursuit of more and more modern young people to have a beautiful figure, regardless of appearance.
Gyms are springing up.
In everyone’s wallet lie one or even several fitness cards.
From running, rope skipping, swimming to equipment, from reducing weight and fat to plasticizing muscle.
It is not a process of shaping one’s own “artificial” body?

For example, the Korean beauty coach, looking at her sharp curve without a trace of fat bee waist, full of traces of exercise, clearly slender and strong sense of vest line.
It can be imagined that in the process of shaping herself, she has paid a lot of sweat and efforts.
If such a coach guides you to keep fit, will you agree?

People used to say “eat by your face.”.
Because looks and body seems to be born, everyone’s starting point is different.
As if fate itself is not fair enough.
But in today’s era, there are more and more acquired means to make up for or even surpass the congenital gap.
The development of science and technology and society as a whole has brought us many ways to make ourselves more beautiful and better.
Why not cherish it?
In an interview with the beauty coach, she said that she likes the feeling of sports and sweating, and also likes her current state.
I think it’s suspected of self pity to be a pure natural beauty who says she likes herself. But it’s true and sincere for such a girl who is full of her own “hard work” to say it.

If we also want to build ourselves and strive to become “waist elite”, we might as well practice these movements more often
1. Plate support

Bend your elbows and support them on the ground. Your shoulders and elbows are perpendicular to the ground. Step on the ground with your feet. Keep your body off the ground. Straighten your trunk. Keep your head, shoulders, hips and ankles in the same plane. Tighten your abdominal muscles and keep breathing evenly.
2. Kneeling and tumbling

Bend your knees together, lift your feet slightly off the ground, lie flat on the floor mat or bed, put your hands on your ears, then use your abdomen to make your thighs work, and slowly lift them up until they are close to your abdomen.
3. Cycling in the air

Lying flat on the ground, hands on both sides of the body, back can be close to the ground, using the abdomen to start power, bending legs, make a bicycle position.

The so-called fitness, in fact, is the same as reading, is a process of improving themselves and polishing themselves.
In the final analysis, the purpose of fitness is to get a better self.
More healthy, more beautiful, more temperament, more popular.
It’s not a crime to cater to aesthetics, and it’s not even a crime to improve yourself.
Jiang Xianjing, who likes to sweat, is beautiful beyond national boundaries.
I hope you also believe that every drop of sweat you shed in order to become better will live up to you.

As a model of sporting goods, she gradually fell in love with sports. In addition to lifting iron in the gym, she also likes to run outdoors. Wu Caiyuan is a magic fitness net red, both men and women like her very much.

Do you like this kind of fitness net which can be salty, sweet and charming? Here, Xiaobian also gives you two kinds of training movements that Amway Wu Caiyuan often does. If you also want to have a small Manyao, learn it together!
**Action 1: Pilates fitness stick swing lunge
Function: thin waist and reduce abdomen

As shown in the picture, first lay the yoga mat, and then put the fitness stick on the shoulder. Step on the foot of the stick with both feet, then step back with your left leg. Next, the shoulders and head turn to the right naturally, then the right leg bends and the left leg squats** Each group has 10 times, and then they have to change their legs for the lunge** It is suggested that you do almost 4 groups every day, so that you can easily lose waist and stomach**
Action 2: lie on one side with pilates stick and lift your legs
Function: firm buttocks

As shown in the picture, lay the yoga mat well, then put your feet into the two feet of the Pilates stick, and then keep lying on your side. The right arm is close to the yoga mat, and then the right palm holds one end of the fitness stick on the yoga mat, and the left hand holds the upper end of the fitness stick. Then the right hand and left hand work together to fix the fitness stick, and then begin to lift the left leg, maintain a certain speed, not too fast** 20 times in each group, and then lie on the side in another direction. It is suggested that you do 4 groups every day, so that you can tighten your hips**

The above two exercises are not difficult, and they are all pilates** In this way, you don’t need to waste a lot of space to lose waist and belly and tighten buttocks at the same time, and the two foot ropes can be easily removed, which is more convenient to carry** It can be said that it is a kind of equipment that can be used for sports anytime and anywhere, and it is also common for men and women. entry.title: Liu Taiyang, born in 1995, is 178cm tall and has a devil's figure. He is beautiful enough to break the rules
entry.content:
**Introduction: * * some people keep fit to lose weight, some keep fit to have an excellent waist hip ratio, and some keep fit without a purpose, just like it. It’s hard for most people to believe that fitness is just for love. After all, fitness means sweating and hard work. But in fact, there is such a person, she is a super fitness girl - Liu Taiyang.

She is a 95 year old girl from Shanxi Province. She was named the goddess of fitness, which she did not expect, but also deserved. Her first place of popularity is in a bodybuilding competition, the reason is very simple, that is too good figure. Interestingly, she was not a contestant in this competition. She became popular as a bodybuilding referee. At that time, she was more popular than the contestants.


What’s so special about her figure? Looking at the photos, we can see that she has long and straight legs, a waist and abdomen without any fat, and a beautiful and tight gluteal muscle. She is the favorite of heaven.

Her curvilinear figure and pure face form a sharp contrast, but the angel’s face and the devil’s figure can describe her appropriately. No matter from which point of view, she can only feel the symmetry of her figure, without exaggerated muscles. This kind of curve is also the dream of many girls. After all, it’s hard to imagine that a 178cm girl can have such a hot figure, but in addition to her body achievements, in fact, she has other achievements that ordinary people can’t imagine.

She is the champion of fitness model, new car model star, Miss World Tourism, Sanda King Star girl, Global Promotion Ambassador of the queen of global tourism, runner up of Olympus bodybuilding competition and the spokesperson of luxury brand up, and even more. Who can imagine that a post-95 girl can have so many achievements, in fact, the credit lies in her conscientiousness and self-discipline.

In her daily life, she often sends her life photos and fitness photos to the Internet. This perfect curve of thin waist and wide hips also makes her dress more like a fashion show, especially her figure when wearing cheongsam.

So how does Liu Taiyang keep such a good figure? Today, I’d like to share with you about this fitness training and diet. If you want to have a good figure, you can learn it together. As long as we stick to it, I believe that the perfect figure curve is just around the corner! Now let’s share two exercises that can be done at home without going out.

#Action 1: squat with elastic circle
Function: promote hip shaping

As shown in the figure, lay the yoga mat, extend the leg into the elastic ring, and open the leg as wide as the hip. Here, you need to pay attention to the position of the elastic ring in the middle of your legs, then raise your arms forward and cross your fingers. Then inhale, bend your knees and squat slowly. Then exhale and slowly straighten your knees back to their original position** 10 times per group, 2-3 groups per day**

#Action 2: kick after kneeling with elastic circle
Function: shaping buttocks

As shown in the figure, put the elastic ring into the legs and pull it to the upper part of the thigh. The whole person is in a kneeling position, face down, and then support the yoga mat with both hands. Then start kicking, use the strength of the hip to make the leg kick back to the limit, and then slowly retract. Remember not to touch the mat when retracting, and then repeat** Do 15 times on the left and right sides, repeat 2-3 groups**

The above two training movements can be done by both men and women. It is recommended that beginners choose a 15 pound elastic ring The elastic ring is made of natural latex, which can provide good tensile resilience. And training action is very much, the body’s major muscle groups can exercise to the basic. This kind of tool can also be carried around, and the way of fitness is simple and easy to learn. It is suitable for all people who want to make their body beautiful.
