entry.title: Looks like Cecilia Cheung, but just an 18 line female star, finally rely on fitness to reverse life
entry.content:
A person’s life can’t be a good time. Only with an optimistic and positive attitude can he get out of the predicament. When people are at a low ebb, they often abandon themselves and do not want to make progress. Today, Xiao Bian is going to introduce a female star whose career is at a low ebb - shamiya.

Many people will feel familiar at the first sight of her. She looks like Cecilia Cheung. But compared with Cecilia Cheung’s great success, her career has been suffering Waterloo. This makes her feel inferior, and her dream of singing seems to be more and more distant from her in reality.

But she still has the seed of singer dream in her heart. With her unremitting efforts, she finally signed the contract. The most terrible thing in the world is that we have tried our best, but in the end we have achieved nothing. Shamiya’s luck has been bad, no matter how much money the company spent on her packaging, but she is still not invited to any advertising.

After exhausting all her strength, shamiya has no courage to face the questioning eyes and voices of the outside world. She enters a state of eating at home without leaving home, and even suffers from depression. After a period of decadence, encouraged by her friends, she came into contact with fitness. Often in the company of friends to do all kinds of strength training, sweat hard every day, so that her body’s negative energy will disappear.

With the gradual obsession with fitness, her mentality is getting better and better. Fitness has completely cured her depression, and she will no longer question the value of her existence. After professional fitness training, she successfully obtained the fitness certificate and became a coach.

With the change of mentality and figure, she started her own fitness career. The pressure brought by her previous work has gone with the wind, and she will never cry and eat too much at night. In fact, fitness can alleviate depression, which is why shamiya opens a new door to her life.

Next, Xiaobian will share with you some of the physical training that shamiya often does. Insisting on doing a few groups of movements can improve the posture and make the body curve more sexy.
Action 1: lie on your side and raise your legs before and after

First of all, I’d like to introduce a set of thin leg movements. The first step is to lie on your side, one hand next to your ears and the other hand in front of you to fix your body. The second step is to put the left foot on the base, raise the right foot high and straighten the leg, and pay attention to the toe straightening. The third step is to swing the leg back and forth with the hip as the axis of the right foot, and feel the stretching feeling of the leg muscles. This action is 20 at a time. Do 3-4 groups according to your own situation every day.
Action 2: supine belly roll

The first step is to lie flat on the mat, straighten your legs, straighten your hands, and then put them above your head. The second part uses the strength of your abdomen to sit up slowly until you can touch your toes. It should be noted that the movement needs to slow down, so that we can feel the strength of the abdomen, which is also conducive to the protection of our lumbar spine. This action is 20 at a time. Do 3-4 groups according to your own situation every day.
Action 3: dynamic stimulation of abdomen

The first step is to lie flat on the mat, with both hands on both sides. The second step is to slowly raise the legs, bend them, and form a 100 degree angle with the thighs. When slowly raising the head and neck, you need to pay attention to let the back completely stick to the mat. The third step is to swing your arms up and down, inhale 5 times, exhale 5 times, and insist on sitting 100 times at a time.
Action 4: squat in a standing position

The first step is to stand on the mat, open your feet to shoulder width, then inhale, raise your arms to both sides of your head, and slowly squat down to exhale. Then inhale, imagine sitting like a chair, arms up, exhale and return to the starting position. Pay attention to this action, standard action, 10 at a time, 2 groups a day.

entry.title: Liu Yelin, 53, has the temperament of 20-30 years old. How did she do it
entry.content:
Liu Yelin’s name first appeared in the public view, because of a hot post of “50 year old girl with a perfect figure of 18 years old”, which quickly spread all over the Internet. Now that she’s 53, she’s really famous, because no matter who sees her picture, they will ask: is this really a 53 year old woman? Beauty is common, 53 years old can still have 20 or 30 years old beauty, it has to be amazing.

With a good figure beyond people’s imagination, Liu Yelin has not only won “China’s top ten fitness figures”, “China’s most influential elegant women” and other awards, but also accepted numerous interviews and appeared in variety shows. In the program, in her 50s, she can still wear a bikini and run like a young girl. She is compact and does not show her old style.

Liu Yelin has been a standard beauty since she was young. But if you are more than half a hundred, you can still have a proud figure and elegant temperament, which does not come from God’s favor. About ten years ago, Liu started her own way of fitness, regardless of the incomprehension of people around her.

She likes all kinds of sports, such as diving, rock climbing and winter swimming. She especially loves to challenge the limit. She even completed the winter swimming challenge of Lake Baikal at minus 40 at the age of 50. Perhaps in her opinion, even the erosion of time and years can be resisted, what is the natural environment?

Liu Yelin’s popularity represents people’s admiration for “frozen age” and people’s real yearning for beauty. Her story tells only one of the most important things. It’s never too late to work out.

As an ordinary person, if we also want to have such a life, the simplest thing is to start from now on.
Here to share some common sports, usually work and leisure can do.
1. Push ups

Push up is the most effective and simple way to exercise chest muscles, hands slightly wider than the shoulder, the body straight.
It’s important to use your chest as much as possible.
2. Abdominal roll

Abdominal exercise is abdominal muscles, lying flat abdominal force, will roll up the upper back, leaving the ground, and the whole process of the lower back is close to the ground.
Abdominal roll should pay attention not to use the body’s inertia like doing sit ups. The purpose of abdominal roll is to exercise abdominal muscles. We must keep the movement stable and feel the burning of abdominal muscles.
3. Squat

The feet are the same width as the shoulders, with a shape of “eight” on the outside and about 30 on the outside °， Stretch your hands horizontally forward and squat until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Squat in addition to legs, but also can exercise to many parts of the body, whether it is weight loss or shaping, long-term adherence will have a good effect.

Maybe not everyone can eventually become a “male god” or a “goddess” like Liu Yelin.
But the purpose and significance of fitness is not here.
Keep young in the body for a few more years, let healthy body eliminate the load of work and life, let oneself have more self-confidence in social life, is fitness can be achieved.
Liu Yelin’s not old is not a “miracle”, and the trick is to put it bluntly only a few words - love and persistence. Fall in love with fitness, fall in love with better you.

entry.title: Practice progressive technical training, advanced sensitive ability and high level
entry.content:
As one of the important physical qualities of athletes, agility is the key skill in many sports. Good sensitivity reflects that athletes have good perception and decision-making ability, as well as coordinated and powerful movement speed quality, which is conducive to the transformation of athletes’ posture and center of gravity, and can also improve the performance level of athletes. Therefore, the development of sensitivity is essential and crucial. Today, I’d like to introduce a progressive training method for developing sensitivity.

The progressive technique training of developing sensitive ability is mainly divided into five stages. The first four stages include linear acceleration, transition movement and direction changing. The fifth stage is to integrate all techniques into an open sensitivity training.

First stage training: linear acceleration
Hold the wall and lift the knee

The athletes hold the wall with both hands, stand on the ground with their feet flat, bend their ankles back, straighten their arms, and tilt their trunks at an angle of 45 degrees to the ground.
Run uphill
5 to 6 groups of accelerated running training (interval between groups until the athletes fully recover) were conducted on the slope of 3 to 8 degrees and the slope length of 10 to 20 meters.
First stage training: transition movement

Practice independent techniques such as backward step, side slide step and cross step between two sign barrels 6 to 10 meters apart.
First stage training: change direction

Athletes jog from 3 to 5 meters to the mark barrel (with the improvement of technology, speed up). At the mark barrel, the athlete completes the change direction cut in action, and the athlete’s cut in direction should be changed alternately during training.
Phase 2: linear acceleration
Two steps against the wall
Starting from the knee forward position of one leg, drive the raised leg to push backward while the knee joint of the other leg flexes forward. In the process, maintain all technical essentials. After reaching the proficiency level, it can be repeated three or more times.
Forward movement training against peer resistance

Stand with your legs together and lean forward to your partner (if any). The partner is responsible for holding you when you lean forward. When all your weight falls on your partner, the partner will step aside and let you fall forward. If you don’t have a partner to help you, you can keep your body in the right position first, then lean forward until you lose your balance. As soon as you remove the force that holds you, and you start to fall forward, you need to accelerate immediately.
15 meter acceleration training
Athletes start with static or dynamic training, and carry out maximum acceleration training.
Second stage training: transition movement
Quadrilateral agility training

Athletes circle 10 meters × 10 meters square, forward sprint, then transition to side slide, back step, and then side slide back to the starting point. The focus of the training is to change the movement quickly every time the athlete reaches the marker barrel.
Second stage training: change direction
● training of changing direction and cutting in for standing players (slow)
The athlete is 3 to 5 meters away from his stationary partner and begins to jog towards him (with the improvement of technique, speed up). The position of the stationary partner enables the athlete to effectively judge the distance to execute the turn cut. The cut in direction should be changed alternately.
The third stage training: linear acceleration
15 meter downhill acceleration training
5 to 6 groups of downhill acceleration training were conducted on the slope of 15 meters.
Face to face standing, turning and chasing training
At the beginning, the two athletes were 5 meters apart and stood face to face. The target line is 15 meters behind each of the two athletes. When receiving certain instructions or seeing visual signals, an athlete starts to run towards the line opposite him. Another athlete has a 5-meter buffer zone, and during the first athlete’s running time in the buffer zone, he can turn around and accelerate towards the same line. In this way, the two athletes form a state of chasing each other.
The third stage training: transition movement
Training with peers

The distance between the two players is 2 meters. Player a is the leader and player B is the follower. In mirror training, the follower needs to follow the leader’s action accurately and keep face-to-face position. The leader can move left and right or back and forth.
Third stage training: changing direction
Mobile team member’s direction changing cut training (with a certain rhythm)
Athletes from 3 to 5 meters, speed up to run to the mobile partner (with the improvement of technology, the pace is accelerated). When the athletes show their ability, the movement speed of the companions should be gradually increased, and the pressure on the practitioners should be appropriately increased.
The fourth stage: from action to linear acceleration
Sign bucket training

Athletes start from No.1 barrel, slide to No.2 barrel, turn to No.3 barrel, and then slide to No.1 barrel. Then the coach calls out a sign bucket number, and the athlete accelerates to the corresponding sign bucket.
The fourth stage training: transition movement
Training with peers
The mirror practice in the fourth stage needs a third person to participate. The third person decides the direction of the athlete’s movement with his fingers in one direction. When the direction needs to be changed, he will change hands. No. 1 athletes respond to external stimuli (rather than self decision-making), while No. 2 athletes respond according to the actions of No. 1 athletes.
The fourth stage training: direction change in linear acceleration
The training of sprint and direction changing among peers

The two athletes were 20 meters apart, standing face to face. When the coach gives the “start” command, the athlete sprints to the 10 meter line in front of him, then turns 180 degrees and sprints back. When they meet, they cut left or right to each other and turn around each other. Initially, the direction of the cut can be determined in advance (using the technology they think is most suitable), but as the ability improves, the athlete needs to make the above reaction. Making decisions at high speed is challenging.
The fifth stage of training: transition to directional movement and linear acceleration movement
Image competition training
The two athletes stand face to face 2 meters apart. Athlete a can move in any direction when facing athlete B all the time. B needs to do the mirror action of a, keeping a distance of 2 meters between them. If player a moves forward, then player B moves backward. The training method is roughly the same. At any time, athlete B can issue the “run” command. When the “run” command is issued, athlete B needs to quickly change direction, bypass a and accelerate to the end. Athlete a needs to change direction according to the action of B and race with B to the end.
For more details on how to scientifically improve sports performance, please refer to the guide to improving sports skills: exercise and scheme design based on improving sports performance.
The above content comes from the guide to improving motor skills: exercise and scheme design based on improving motor performance

entry.title: Russian fitness network red, hourglass shaped figure, known by netizens & quot; Kardashian version 2.0 & quot;
entry.content:
In the past, Asians generally preferred slim figure, but gradually people began to like the “hourglass” figure in Europe and America. After all, the latter is more concave and convex than the former, and the chest and buttocks are full, which is also the body type pursued by many fitness women.

There is such a little sister, anastasiya kvitk, who is called Kardashian version 2.0. She is a girl with an hourglass figure. Ten percent of her body is made by herself, which makes her popular all over the Internet.

She is a Russian girl. She is 24 years old. She is popular in the pipeline, with tens of millions of fans, this heat is amazing. The core of her popularity is her figure, with a perfect curve of 95-63-105.

At the same time, anastasiya kvitk’s face value is also very high. Coupled with this kind of inverse body shape curve, many fans have imitated her fitness actions. A lot of people may have to work out because of their career and body shape, but she is not. She is from the heart like fitness, through their own high degree of self-discipline finally achieved success.

She is known as Kardashian version 2.0 because she has the same body shape as Kardashian. For this title, anastasiya kvitk is very happy. After all, it is also a high recognition of her strength and figure. But her character is not Kardashian at all, she has a vibrant vitality and youthful charm.

This pure and lustful feeling is more attractive, and Kardashian is the charm of Medusa level. How does anastasiya kvitk keep fit? First, she goes to the gym at a regular frequency every week, at least four times a week. Secondly, she is strict with the exercise plan every time, never perfunctory. Then she has a careful plan for her daily diet, which makes her reach the perfect curve of 95-63-105.

Today, I’d like to introduce three hip and leg movements to you. If you want to have the same figure of anastasiya kvitk, please move together!
Action 1: Kettlebell squat

Action tips: * Kettlebell pull squat, mainly to exercise the lower limbs, can involve our hips and legs, want to shape the legs and hip friends can refer to.
First of all, we need to prepare a Kettlebell, then we need to stand up straight with feet hip width. Pull the Kettlebell from the ground with one hand, then hold it with both hands, do a squat, then put the Kettlebell down, then repeat with another hand, pull the Kettlebell up, do a squat again, repeat 20 times, do four groups.
**Action 2: Bulgarian split squat

Action tips: * Bulgarian split squat can exercise our leg muscles and hips. So girls who want to practice hip lifting and leg shaping can do it.
First of all, we need to prepare a pair of dumbbells, and then put one foot in a high position, which can be a bench, a step or a pedal. Then separate the feet, keep the core tight, then inhale when squatting, let us feel the stimulation of thighs and buttocks, and then squat up and exhale, repeat 15 times for each leg, do four groups.
**Action three, dumbbell hard pull back squat

**Action tips: * this action is mainly to exercise to the outside of our hips. First of all, we need to prepare a pair of dumbbells, two feet standing shoulder width. Straighten your back, bend your knees, do a hard pull, then stand up straight, then take a step backward with one leg, and then squat. Then repeat the action with the other leg, repeat each leg ten times, repeat 4 groups.
Can you handle such a girl? Welcome to comment area.

entry.title: She is 185cm tall, with big legs and a sweet little face. She is the goddess of the super model world
entry.content:
Today, I’m going to introduce a Supermodel of Weimi, Carly Klaus! She is 185, with a very sweet face and a very sexy figure. Carly often appears on the covers of various fashion magazines, and many people have already made friends with her before she was on the Vermeer show.

In order to learn programming, she quit her job and even invented a small machine in the process of research. This process from zero to zero has conquered countless fans. It can be said that she is a very intelligent beauty.

Beautiful people will always attract the same beautiful people close to her, she also attracts her own son. They soon made an engagement, the man is a good-looking Gao Fu Shuai.

It can be said that Carly’s career and love have been successful, and she has never given up fitness on the way to complete these things. At the same time, she is also very particular about food, never eat those high calorie food. Both ways, she can have such a life that everyone envies.

People who can’t keep their mouth shut can’t control their weight. Once they give up, it’s very painful to lose weight. Even some people lose weight by dieting, which is also a very irrational behavior. If you want to have a perfect body like Carly Claus, you must make up your mind to keep fit. Don’t give up halfway, or you won’t be able to achieve your goal

Today, Xiao Bian will show you how Carly Claus works out everyday? What is the most common training action?
Action 1: pull the Kettlebell with elastic belt

This movement is mainly to train our buttocks, back and hamstrings. The first step is to fix the two ends of the elastic rope, and then clip the other end into the hip joint. When standing, the elastic rope is placed in front of the pelvis. The second step is to step forward, open the feet to shoulder width, straighten the back of the third part, tighten the abdomen, and lift the dumbbell with both hands. It should be noted that during the whole process, keep your legs immovable, knees slightly bent forward, waist and back straight, when you reach the top with force, you will feel the tension of your hips, and then extend your hips upward at a constant speed. Let gluteus maximus fully feel the squeeze feeling, in order to achieve the best exercise effect. 15 each time, 3-4 groups per day according to personal situation.
Action 2: ox horn bag load backward arrow step squat

This movement is mainly to train our hips and legs. The first step is to stand well with both feet together. The second step is to put the horn bag on the neck. The second step is to extend the left leg to the rear and extend it backward. Note that in this process, the back should be kept straight, the abdomen should be tight, and the knee joint should not exceed the toes, and should not touch the ground, 15 times per group, 3-4 groups per day according to personal conditions.
Action 3: dumbbell hip Bridge

This movement is mainly to train our hips. The first step is to lie flat on the mat and extend the legs to shoulder width. The second step is to place the dumbbell at the hip joint. At this time, bend the knees and feet to the ground and hold the hands against the dumbbell. It should be noted that during exercise, first tighten the waist and abdomen, inhale and stretch the hip to lift the dumbbell; When you reach the top, your shoulders, hips and knees should be in a straight line, your hips should be tight, and you can feel the muscle contraction of your hips. Then exhale and slowly lower, making sure to squeeze your waist and abdomen and keep your hips from touching the ground. 15 each time, 3-4 groups per day according to personal situation.

entry.title: She is after 00, high school began to fitness, with peach hips and vest line, is now fitness net red
entry.content:

Her plump hips, waist and clear waistline are enviable. What’s more remarkable is her long legs. The combination of these hardwares is better than most female college students.

Now it has become a popular fitness net, and this selfless sharing of fitness experience also makes the stickiness of fans continue to increase. Her motivation is different from that of most people. She works out to relieve the pressure of study. As time goes by, she gets used to fitness. The more she understands fitness, the more she can’t extricate herself from fitness. Slowly, she falls in love with fitness.

Regular fitness people have this feeling of addiction, a day without exercise are not used to. Having a good figure is inseparable from self-discipline exercise, at least five times a week to fitness. This frequency can be said to be quite high, that is, other students spend their time in entertainment on fitness, so she has today’s achievements.

Today, Xiaobian will share with you some of her hip lifting exercises. Let’s learn together. Maybe you are the next fitness net red!
Action 1: standing gantry rope abduction

Action tips: * * side to the gantry pulley, fix the rope on the outside feet or ankles, tighten the core, stop the waist and back, bend the knees and hips, bend the upper body and hold the gantry with one hand. Hold the body, and then exhale the leg outside the outward expansion, tighten the hips, inhale slowly relax restore. Then exhale again and push your hips outward. This movement mainly trains our buttock muscles and shapes our colleagues, especially some partners who have concave buttocks on both sides can practice more. These two movements can make our buttocks fuller. One group did about 15 ~ 20 repetitions, four groups.
**Action 2: standing gantry rope hip extension

*Action tips: * stand facing the gantry pulley, fix the rope on one foot, use the other foot as support, and hold the gantry with both hands. Bend your hips and knees and keep your back straight. exhale. When the core tightens the buttocks, we extend our legs backward to feel the feeling of buttock muscles tightening and exerting force. Inhale slowly and do 15-20 in a group. Repeat four groups left and right. This action can make our buttocks fuller and more graceful, and increase the thickness of the buttocks.
*Action 3: kettle bell squat
**

**Action tips: * feet apart and hip width, core tight, back straight, choose a suitable Kettlebell. Hold the Kettlebell in both hands and put it on your chest. After the core is tightened, move the center of gravity to our left leg and take a small step to the left and rear of our right leg. Then bend your left knee, lean back and squat down, put the gravity on our left hip, inhale, straighten your left leg, straighten your body, restore your right leg, and then repeat the above movement. A group of 15 to 20, about each repeat four groups, in the process of doing, we must focus on our squat buttocks, so as to train our buttock muscles well.
How old did you start to work out? We haven’t started to work out yet. Let’s do it now.

entry.title: South Korea fitness goddess, height 168 cm, perfect body proportion, where are very eye-catching
entry.content:
Everyone has a love for beauty. For fitness partners, they all hope their body is perfect. Moreover, Asians appreciate the slim body. Many people think that the thin body is more beautiful. However, there is always a saying on the Internet that the slightly fat body is the most beautiful. Today, what Xiaobian brings you is a goddess in the fat world.

The little sister in the picture is our protagonist today. A fitness net red from South Korea, named grace Kim, is born in the 90s. She is young. She has a loli face that everyone loves. She feels very sweet when she laughs, just like a girl next door. She is adorable.

Look at this beautiful face, with the devil’s body, 130 Jin weight, it seems very sexy on her body, the whole body is concave and convex, without a trace of fat, height 168cm, the body is very symmetrical, because of long-term fitness, can create such a perfect body, so many fans are chasing.

This little sister, 29 years old, is a designer. Because of her hot figure, she is also very popular on the Internet. She has 410000 fans on social networking sites. Her sweet looks match her sexy figure. No matter where she is, she is always the focus of the crowd.

But with such a good figure, who would have thought that a few years ago, she was a real little fat girl. When she was at school, her little sister liked to eat fried food, such as fried chicken and hamburger. She often had to eat a little every day, and she didn’t know how to control her appetite.

In this way, her weight has changed a lot, from 110 Jin to 140 Jin, her face has grown a circle, and her figure has become more bloated. With the change of her figure, her classmates around her point at her, walking in the street, there are always people discussing her, and she feels very low self-esteem.

So, she began to decide to lose weight. At the beginning, because she didn’t have any weight loss experience, she tried to go on a diet to lose weight. She only ate one meal every day, and didn’t eat breakfast and dinner. No matter how hungry she was, she had to stick to it. But dieting also had a little effect. She lost six kilograms in five days.

However, with the increase of time, the speed of dieting to lose weight is getting slower and slower, her physique and immunity are getting worse and worse, and she also got anorexia, the body is very uncomfortable. Recommended by her friends, she felt that she could no longer go on a diet, so she went on a fitness program.

At the beginning of fitness, she is also as poor as ordinary people. She is often tired before finishing several movements. But for her good figure, she grits her teeth and sticks to it. Under the sweat again and again, she gains her good figure, and the curve of her figure is getting better and better.

Up to now, she still insists on fitness and exercise every day, and strength training five times a week to maintain her good figure. When her figure gets better, her mental state also changes, and she becomes more and more confident, and faces a new life with a positive attitude.

Do you love such a goddess?
At the end of the article, Xiao Bian shares with you two common training moves of goddess. If you want to build a good figure, you can learn them together

#Action 1: kick back with the fitness stick
Function: raise buttocks and thin legs

As shown in the figure, put the fitness stick on the yoga mat, support it with both hands, kneel one foot on the mat, put the other foot on the elastic rope, and then lift the leg backward and upward to feel the power of the hip. Do 20 times for each foot in each group, repeat 3-4 groups, and stick to it for one month, the hip effect will be very significant. Must insist!

#Action 2: lie on your side and lift your legs
Function: thin legs, improve leg shape

As shown in the figure, the body side support on the yoga mat, the fitness stick standing on the mat, hand support, legs straight, one leg up to the highest point, stop for a while, and then slowly lower, two legs repeat, each leg do 20 times, a total of 4 groups.

Before, many little friends said that they didn’t have time to go out for fitness. What can we do to exercise at home? You can follow the above two movements. You only need to use a yoga mat and a fitness stick. This is a perfect combination.

A fitness stick can exercise to the whole body muscle group, can exercise to compact the chest, shape the back, create a word shoulder, thin arm, thin leg, practice hip, very suitable for home exercise, if you also exercise at home, starting with a fitness stick is a very good choice!
The fitness stick is made of NBR material, metal inner tube and latex tube. The total weight is less than one kilogram. It is very convenient to carry and can be disassembled freely. It is easy to store and does not occupy space.

entry.title: Miyagawa Mayer, the Japanese goddess of buttocks, has a high face and a concave and convex figure, which has attracted many fans

She used to work as a model. After unremitting efforts, she finally became an accompanying reporter in the NBA Golden State Warriors team.

entry.title: She is a top model in South Korea. She is 172 in height and has a concave and convex figure. She keeps fit by keeping fit
entry.content:
Fitness has become a hot topic now. After all, people are pursuing health and body maintenance. Everyone wants to have a good figure, let their face to a higher level, but fitness is a difficult thing to stick to, so many people will give up to enter the fitness army.

South Korea can be said to be a country that attaches the most importance to appearance, especially the pursuit of women’s beauty is to save money for cosmetic surgery. As a result, South Korea’s fitness talent is endless, and sun Yunzhu is one of the best.

She is a top class model, height 172cm, with concave and convex sexy figure and lovely pure face, so she is also known as “the most popular beauty in South Korea”. Perhaps because of her career, she is known for her strict management of her figure. It’s this strictness that keeps her figure in such a young and sexy state.

In the interview, she once said: in fact, fitness is a subconscious habit! After all, body is more attractive than appearance, so she stays in the gym when she’s not working. Also often on-line sun out their own photos, and fitness will ease her work pressure.

Fitness is killing two birds with one stone for her. She can not only keep fit, but also relax herself. Her way of fitness is flexible, if there is no condition to go to the gym to do regular training, she will buy equipment at home to do some strength training. As long as you want to keep fit, you can keep fit anytime and anywhere.

Fitness is an addictive thing. As long as you keep a good habit, things will go on naturally. As long as you are not a lazy person, it is not difficult to keep fit. Fitness is the world’s most natural way to prevent aging, but also to improve mental state.

So for us, what should we do to have a good figure like sun Yunzhu? Next, let’s share two exercises that we can do at home!
Action 1, yoga ball sitting posture, two head bending

We’ve got Yoga balls, yoga mats, sportswear and a pedal rope. Then lay the yoga mat on the ground and put the yoga ball on our yoga mat.
Action tips: * tighten the core, straighten the waist and back, focus on the center of the yoga ball, slightly separate the feet, fix the yoga ball and keep the body stable. If there is no way to stabilize the yoga ball, you can put the yoga ball on the wall and make it stable with the help of the wall.
Then step on the base of the tension rope with both feet, palm up, and hold the handle of the tension rope. After getting ready for the posture, the serious illness clamps our body, exhales, the biceps force is small, and the arm rises slowly until the muscle reaches the peak contraction. Inhale and slowly return the arm down.
This movement is mainly to train our arm, biceps muscle, and make our forearm lines more aesthetic. One group completed 15 to 20 times and repeated 4-6 groups.
**Action 2: pull the rope to sit and raise the knee

**Action tips: * sit on the yoga mat, keep your back straight, tighten the core, and step on the base of the tension rope with both feet. Then grasp the grip of the tension rope with both hands, tighten the elastic rope, straighten and tighten the waist and abdomen, and then slowly lift our feet off the ground to maintain this posture.
Then exhale, legs and body slowly close to the middle, so that our abdominal muscles contract, inhale, body slightly back, straighten our legs.
This movement may be unstable due to lifting the foot off the ground, so we must tighten the abdomen before doing it to make the body stable. This action can train our abdominal muscles and make a good vest line. One group completed 15-20 and repeated 4-6 groups.

entry.title: South Korea's 52 year old frozen beauty dentist is like a sister to her 20-year-old daughter. How did she do it
entry.content:
As we all know, there are many beautiful women in South Korea. Today we are going to introduce a dentist. She is 52 years old and her name is Li Xiuzhen. Previously, she and her 20-year-old daughter participated in South Korea’s SBS TV program “different dreams in the same bed.”. However, Li Xiuzhen said that since her daughter went to high school, women seldom communicate with her. She can only send her photos on the Internet to find her sense of existence.

However, what netizens care about is not the contradiction between mother and daughter, but Li Xiuzhen’s young appearance. Mother and daughter stand together and can’t tell who is the mother and who is the daughter. They are really beautiful women.


Li Xiuzhen keeps such a good figure entirely through her usual exercise. From the photos she shared, it’s easy to see that she loves sports very much. In the past, Li Xiuzhen also said in the program that she has been training three times a week for many years, and it is uninterrupted. Her strong perseverance is admirable.

Some time ago, Li Xiuzhen came to the column of fasting people. Her daily life is either in the operating room or in the treatment room. When she helps patients with treatment, she often needs to bend down, causing backache. This is one of the reasons why she attaches great importance to exercise. As long as she has a break, she will do some simple stretching exercises.

Besides sports and maintenance, Li Xiuzhen believes that the best beauty secret is to keep a happy mood. She started using social media because she wanted to interact with more people. As long as you are in a good mood, you can shine naturally from the inside out.

Although 52 year old Li Xiuzhen’s figure is enviable, she can’t help eating desserts and cakes occasionally. But she always brushes her teeth after eating sweets. Maybe it’s because of her career. As shown in the figure, lie on the yoga mat at any time, with one elbow supporting the mat surface, the lower leg keeping the knee bending state, keeping the body stable, and the core keeping tight. 2. Stoop to row

As shown in the picture, at any time, keep the legs apart, keep the same width as the hip, slightly bend the knee joint, naturally point the toes forward, bend the hip and knee, slowly bend the body, keep the angle between the body and the ground at 45 degrees, and keep the arms straight on both sides of the body, close to the trunk.

In addition, she also has a hobby is to go to the nightclub dancing, every time as long as she appeared will cause huge repercussions. After all, it can be said that body is king in nightclubs. This high degree of self-discipline and efforts also make Jin Taizhu have the body that everyone dreams of. After all, a good body can only be raised by self-discipline fitness. Now she has a good career and body, everyday life is very happy.

If you want to have a good figure, but there is no way to get started. Let’s get started with the fitness moves we prepared for you!
Action 1 elastic rope dumbbell hard pull

Action tips: * first prepare two dumbbells, then two stools and an elastic rope. The elastic rope was hung on two dumbbells, and then we all stood on the stool.
Standing on a stool with feet the same width as hips, the dumbbell is placed between the legs. Then we hold one end of the dumbbell with both hands. Then we keep our knees slightly bent, keep our back straight, tighten our core, and lean down to our back parallel to the ground. This is the gluteus maximus, and the hamstring. There will be a full stretch, breath, and then stand straight, each group to do 12, do four groups.
**Action 2: stretch squat with dumbbell

Action tips: * first prepare two stools, an elastic band and a pair of dumbbells. The two dumbbells are connected and tied together with elastic bands. One is on the ground, the other is grasped by hand, and both feet are the same width as hips. Stand on two stools. Grasp dumbbell with both hands, bend hip, bend knee and squat down. Squat until your thighs are parallel to the ground. Keep the core tight throughout the process, keep your back straight, and pay attention when squatting. Keep your body straight up and down. Don’t rock back and forth. Squat, inhale, squat, exhale, 15 times in each group, do four groups.
**Action three leg weight-bearing hip Bridge

**Action tips: * prepare two dumbbells and an elastic rope, and then lean your back on the dumbbell stool. One leg supports the ground, and elastic rope is tied between two dumbbells. A dumbbell on the hip. The other leg is suspended and slightly bent. At the same time, exhale. Stop for a second at the top, then slowly drop and inhale at the same time, 15 times in each group. Alternate on both sides, 15 times in each group, do four groups.

**Action 3: half squat side walk with elastic circle

**Action tips: * this action is also called crab walk. We need to prepare an elastic ring, and then put the elastic ring on the thigh, with the body in a squatting position. Then hold your hands together. Crouch and take a step from the side. The other foot to follow, and then alternate left and right, 20 times in each group, repeat four groups.

At that time, she was 25 years old, after all, 25 years old can be said to be the dividing point of a woman’s figure. People around her also regard her as a joke and don’t think much of her. But people who have dreams have energy in their heart. No matter what other people think, she always insists on her dream.

After three years of sweating and planned training, she now has a perfect and sexy figure. The beautiful waistcoat and peach hips are shining like the invisible wings of her dream. Now she’s only 28 years old, and she has thousands of fans.

Now the healthy and beautiful figure is the witness of pigmeng’s persistence and efforts. Look at her photos now, are you flattered by her? In fact, most of the time, the person who prevents us from realizing our dream is the one who is not firm. Only when we believe in ourselves and are willing to work hard for it, we can become the kind of person we want to be.

There is a process to do everything, from not to be able, from being able to be proficient. Are you still envious of other people’s figure? Don’t salivate at other people’s good figure on the screen every day, now start to move!
Today, I’d like to share with you the fitness tips that pigmeng, a Korean little sister, often does. I hope you can have the same vest line and peach hips as her!
Action 1: lift your legs after bending over the rope

Action tips: * this action is mainly to exercise our hips. Girls who want to practice buttocks must not miss this action.
First of all, we need to stand on the gantry, then put the rope on our feet, then support with one leg, keep knee slightly bent, support with both hands on the gantry, and lean forward, then tighten the core, lift one leg backward, stop at the top when lifting backward, then exhale when exerting force, and inhale when slowing down. 15 times for each leg, repeat four groups.
**Action 2: pull the rope hard

Action tips: * this action is mainly to exercise our hips, which is a bit like the barbell hard pull, but she does it through the rope.
First of all, adjust the weight well, and then use the grip pressed by the rope to make the grip. Hold the two heads with both hands. Feet hip width, waist straight, body bent and then to extend our hips, the body bent parallel to the ground, and then pull up. Remember not to use arms to pull, rely on our hips to force, each group do 15 times, repeat four groups.
**Action 3: split squat

**Action tips: * Bulgarian split squat not only trains our leg muscles, but also focuses on training our hips. So girls who want to practice buttocks must add this action.
First of all, we can find a bench or a higher position, and then separate our hands and feet. Hold the dumbbell tightly with both hands, then bend your knees to squat, try to squat a little lower to feel the power of our hips and thighs, exhale when squatting, do it alternately with two legs, 15 times on each side, repeat four groups.
Conclusion: that’s all for today’s content. If you want to have a good figure like this goddess, hurry up.

entry.title: Stick to rope skipping for 10 weeks, what changes will your body have Fitness brother's personal experience tells you the answer
entry.content:
Many fitness people always think that rope skipping consumes more calories than running, and even think that rope skipping is ten minutes worth half an hour of running.

In fact, this understanding is wrong. It’s not that skipping rope consumes more calories than running. It has a lot to do with the speed, strength and intensity of training. If you jump less than 100 times in 10 minutes and run a few kilometers in half an hour, it’s obvious that rope skipping consumes less energy than running. But from the common situation, rope skipping is a good way to reduce fat, and rope skipping is easier than running.

I found a foreign fitness brother on the Internet. His name is Sam. in ten weeks, he changed from 164 kg, 14.3% of body fat to 155.8 kg, 7.8% of body fat, and developed his chest and abdominal muscles. During this period, he only used rope skipping exercise and some walking training, eating three meals a day to keep normal, did not participate in any other fitness exercise. Do you think you can’t think about it? Just use such a simple way to train abdominal and chest muscles in a little more than two months.
Now let’s feel Sam’s sports journey together!
Between the beginning of training, Sam had 164 kg, and the body fat rate was 14.3%.

After a week of training, Sam changed from 164 Jin to 162.8 Jin, and the body fat rate also decreased to 13.5%.

After two weeks of training, Sam became 162.2 kg and the body fat rate was 12.9%.

After three weeks of training, Sam became 161.8 kg, and the body fat rate was 12.3%.

After 4 weeks of training, Sam became 161.4 kg, body fat rate was 11%.
We can see that this month’s training is effective. Sam’s weight and body fat change every week.

After 5 weeks of training, Sam became 159.8 kg, and the body fat rate was 10.6%.

After 6 weeks of training, Sam became 159.8 kg and the body fat rate was 10%.

After 7 weeks of training, Sam became 159.2 kg, body fat rate was 9.8%.

After 8 weeks of training, Sam became 157.4 kg and the body fat rate was 9.2%.

After 9 weeks of training, Sam became 156.2 kg, body fat rate was 9%.

After 10 weeks of training, Sam became 155.8 kg and the body fat rate was 7.8%. After ten weeks of training, Sam’s weight, body fat and abdominal muscles have changed significantly.

Is still thinking about why rope skipping can achieve such a significant fat reduction effect? Let Xiaobian tell you today.
In fact, rope skipping consumes a lot of calories. For a person of 110 kg, if he keeps skipping rope for 10 minutes every day, he can consume 90 kilocalories, which is far more than that of playing ball or running.
Moreover, rope skipping also has many benefits for our body, such as helping us coordinate hands and feet, enhancing our cardiopulmonary function, and achieving the effect of fat burning and body shaping.

#Why can skipping rope reduce fat?
Skipping rope can help us burn fat. Of course, rope skipping can’t just hold the rope and jump with both feet in place. It needs some strength and methods. First of all, we should achieve the intermittent training mode, that is, the mode of speed change. Only in this way can we speed up the heart rate and consume energy.

At this point, many people can guess that the intermittent training of rope skipping is similar to HIIT, but the intensity is not as strong as HIIT.

Rope skipping has always been loved by fitness people, just like many stars, they often use this way of fitness, such as fruit sister Katie Pei, who also brings this sport to the stage, so that everyone can understand the benefits of rope skipping.

As soon as you see Hollywood movies, are you immediately attracted by the figure of the actors? Are you envious of their figure? In fact, rope skipping helps them.

Let Xiaobian tell you the basic steps of rope skipping training.
Step 1: jump with both feet for about one minute
Step 2: then squat in the lunge, 20 times in each group
Step 3: run and jump for 1 minute
Step 4: do push ups 10 groups
Step 5: jump with both legs for one minute
Step 6: support the plate for 30 seconds
Step 7: run and jump for another minute
Do 2-3 groups in this way every day, keep practicing for a month, and your figure will change obviously.

Her efforts and seriousness seem to have a kind of magic, which makes people unconsciously want to work with her to make themselves better. They should become elegant old ladies who can also wear flowers for themselves when they are 60.” So Xiaobian believes that as long as you don’t give up your growth and start to make yourself better, then it’s not too late.
Today, I introduce 7 abdominal muscle training moves. I hope you can have a charming vest line and a better self like yuan Shanshan.
Abdominal training program
Action 1: bend your knees and roll your belly

Action tips: lie flat on the ground, hands on both sides of the head neck, legs and head up, then waist force, legs and upper body inward movement contraction, and then extend at the same time. 10 in a group, do 4 groups.
Action 2: start at both ends

Action tips: lie flat on the ground, lift both legs and upper body, and straighten both legs and arms at the same time, then apply force at the waist and stretch both arms forward until they touch the ankle. In groups of 12, do 4.
Action 3: kneel and lift your legs

Action tips: first of all, kneel on the ground with both legs, straighten your arms, and put your palms on the ground. Then one leg is raised, the waist is forced, the raised leg is forced to rise, at the same time, the head and upper body also follow the upward movement. 10 in a group, do 4 groups.
Action 4: supine hip Bridge

Action tips: first, make the body flat, lying on the ground, and then bend the knee, so that the leg and the ground vertical, and two feet on the ground; Then put your arms straight on both sides of your body and spread your palms; Finally, the waist force, so that the waist and buttocks at the same time up, and then down. Do 15 at a time, do 4 groups.
Action 5: squat with bare hands

Action tips: stand with both legs as wide as the shoulder, put your hands in front of your chest, exert yourself at the waist, bend your legs to move your body down, and then straighten your legs to move your body up. In groups of 15, do four.
Action 6: supine leg lift

Action tips: lie flat on the ground, two arms on both sides of the body, legs straight, and then the waist force, legs up extension, until the legs remain perpendicular to the ground. 10 in a group, do 4 groups.
Action 7: touch your foot on the opposite side

Action tips: first lie flat on the ground, then exert yourself at the waist, extend your left hand forward to touch your right foot, then extend your right hand forward to touch your left foot, and move your head and upper body forward at the same time. 10 in a group, do 4 groups.
Whether it’s a good figure or a good life, hard work and self-discipline are really very important! Come on, I believe you can be as confident and powerful as Yuan Shanshan.

entry.content:
People who have been paying close attention to variety shows have more or less an impression on “Dear inn” starred by Liu Tao and Wang Ke. One of them is Liu Yelin, who is over 50 years old. She was swimming in winter, which made everyone feel very amazing and admired. In other variety shows, she has also performed weight-bearing squats, so she has appeared on all major information platforms.

In fact, her previous job was very common, that is, a librarian, living a two-point and one-line life all day. I’ve also been a nurse. Seeing her sexy body curve, no one can think of her past. She started fitness at the age of 30, and after 20 years of constant fitness, she succeeded.

When she was 50 years old, she was promoted to the status of “fitness girl”, and the efforts behind her were unimaginable. Fitness is the only thing that you can gain if you stick to it. In this long time, she has become an attractive woman with a devil’s body.

From the pictures on the major websites, we can see that the management standard of her figure is very strict. The whole body is covered with a thin layer of muscle, and there is no extra fat on the waist and legs. The whole person is full of the healthy beauty of sunshine.

From her love of winter swimming, we can find that she is a more exciting person. In her spare time, she always takes part in all kinds of extreme challenges. For example, lay a mat in the white snow, and then start doing all kinds of yoga.

Now she has already become a fitness expert. When she goes shopping with her son outside, she is often misunderstood as a couple. It can be seen that fitness brings not only a good figure, but also a young face.

Next, Xiao Bian will share with you Liu Yelin’s usual strength training. If you want to have a devil’s figure and a young face, come and learn it!
Action 1: the gantry rope is extended

Action tips: * swing the pulley of the gantry to the bottom. Turn your body sideways to the pulley and fasten the rope to one of the outer feet. Hold the gantry with one hand, keep the body stable, tighten the core, straighten the back, and bend your knees.
Then move the center of gravity to the left leg, the outer leg will straighten the gantry rope, exhale outward, and tighten the hips. Inhale slowly, do 15 ~ 20 on one side, and then do it on the other side, four groups on each side.
**Second, stretch the hip with the elastic ring

Action tips: * * put the elastic loop that you can control on our knees. Support the body with knees and hands, push down on the ground, straighten the waist and back, tighten the core, and separate the hands from the shoulder width to maintain the stability of the body.
Then move the center of gravity to our left leg, lift the right leg slightly off the ground, exhale, force the right hip, and lift the right leg backward and upward as a body width movement. Inhale and return your right leg to the ground. A group of about 15 ~ 20 repeats, four groups.
**Action three, elastic ring single leg hip bridge

**Action tips: * put the elastic hoop on our knees. Lie on your back, bend your knees and keep your feet on the ground. Heel as close as possible to our hips, core tight, exhale, one leg straight up fixed, and then the other leg to support our body is hip up. Inhale and slowly drop your hips. Do 15-20 in one group, and then do the other side. Repeat four groups left and right.
In the process of doing the movement, we must pay attention to raise up, and keep the straight leg. Then the core should be tightened. When doing hip bridge up, the hip should keep the peak contraction, stay for 1 to 2 seconds, then inhale, the hip is slowly falling, close to the ground, do not touch the ground.

This kind of immortal love also makes the majority of fans envy, their husband and wife are also known as “the most suitable couple”! Although the marriage ended in 13 years, her career was also affected, but she did not abandon herself.

She’s very strict with her exercise plan. She keeps good shape and good lines at the same time. Many people don’t know that she is also a yoga instructor with yoga certificate and a senior nutritionist.

She soon found the real prince charming and got married again. In pregnancy is also a rapid recovery of body, so how does she do it? Now I’d like to share with you some of her usual exercises, which can be practiced at home. If you want to have Miranda Kerr’s body, hurry up!
Action 1: push the pull rope to lift the shoulder

What you need: pedal tension rope, yoga mat, sportswear, warm water
Action tips: keep the body upright, stop the waist and back, tighten the core, fix the bottom end of the tension rope with both feet, hold the grip with both hands, exhale, force the shoulder muscles to raise the arm upward, make the arm parallel to the ground as far as possible, lower the wrist than the elbow, inhale, put the hands down slowly, do 15-20 in one group, repeat 4 groups. This action shapes the shoulder line.
Action 2: pull rope sitting posture, two head bending

Tools: chair, pedal, thruster
Action tips: sit and stand on the stool, straighten the waist and back, tighten the core, fix the bottom of the tension rope with both feet, hold the grip handle of the tension rope with palms of both hands upward, clamp both sides of the body with the big arm, exhale biceps, bend the small arm upward, inhale slowly, do 15-20 in one group, repeat 4 groups. This movement mainly trains the arm muscle, can mold the arm line, reduces the arm fat.

entry.title: Wang Sicong can't win the female anchor, the figure beauty charm is full, in line with the Asian aesthetic
entry.content:
In real life, ordinary people rarely have long legs and high appearance at the same time. In fact, high appearance and long legs are born many times, so you don’t have to feel inferior because of this. As long as you have a positive attitude towards life, an upward heart is enough.

By comparing the girls in different countries, it can be found that the girls in South Korea pay more attention to the body management. This is mainly because South Korea has a relatively good fitness atmosphere, so we are more concerned about appearance management. Today we will introduce a popular fitness anchor - Mina!

So what makes her so popular? This is because of her devil figure and angel face, especially her sexy figure, which makes her popular on the website. Even Wang Sicong wanted to sign her, but she refused! You know, the contract fee provided by the national husband is as high as 200 million, but Mina still suffers the temptation to refuse to be his anchor.

It is because after the rejection of the national husband, more and more people pay attention to Mina. At first it was because of curiosity, and then we were gradually surrounded by her figure. Her peach hips, straight double peaks and beautiful waistcoat make girls yearn for her.

It seems that her popularity is due to external forces, but in fact, the reason for her popularity lies in her self-discipline. They are running when others are walking, which is the difference between successful people and ordinary people, and also the reason why Mina is excellent.

She would choose at least four days a week to do strength training, Pilates, dance and other beneficial sports. At first glance, it doesn’t seem like much, but as long as the fitness people should be able to know the difference.

Mina usually prefers to drink black coffee, and every time she makes a cup of black coffee half an hour before exercise. Her tight figure is also related to this coffee. Drinking a cup of black coffee before exercise can make you concentrate better and concentrate more. Black coffee is pure coffee, and it doesn’t add any sugar. It tastes bitter, Black coffee can improve metabolism during exercise and help to burn fat. Therefore, many people do not know that she has this habit. If you want to have a good figure, you can also drink a cup of coffee before exercise to make your exercise more efficient.

Action one, barbell hip push

Action tips: * put a protective cover on the lever, put the barbell in a comfortable position on the lower abdomen, and don’t press yourself too hard. Push the buttocks up when you exhale. When you reach the peak of contraction, it takes 2-3 seconds to let the muscles have time to do continuous contraction, so that the training is more efficient, and the buttocks slowly fall when you inhale. Do 8-12 in one group, and repeat 4-6 groups.
**Second, dumbbell squat

Action tips: * if you want better training effect, you can prepare two training benches. And dumbbells for you.
The movement should be able to stand on the training bench with both feet, and adjust the distance between the two training benches.
Grasp one end of the dumbbell with both hands, straighten the waist and back, tighten the core, inhale, squat backward and downward on the buttocks, and then stay for 2-3 seconds. Exhale, buttocks tight, and stand up straight. If you only want to practice to the buttocks and legs without a little stimulation, do a half squat, so that the squat distance becomes shorter. One group did it 12-15 times. Repeat 4-6 groups.
**Action 3: hip abduction in sitting position

**Action tips: * check the safety of the equipment first, and adjust the weight suitable for yourself. Then sit and stand on the cushion, with both feet on the abducted foot. The core is tight and the waist is straight. The body can lean forward slightly to exhale, the hips work, and the legs expand outward to the maximum extent. Inhale slowly toward the middle. Then exhale again, tighten your hips and spread out to both sides. Maintain peak contraction for 2-3 seconds. This action can train the gluteus medius of our buttocks. Make your hips fuller and thicker. Make 8-12 in one group. Repeat 4-6 groups

entry.title: Yi Nengjing, 52, is as thin as a 25-year-old girl, from 140 Jin to 100 Jin
entry.content:
Every time I see stars on the screen, I believe everyone will be very envious, envious of their radiant beauty and concave convex body. For example, Lin Zhiying, he Jiong and Zhao Yazhi are all known as young stars. Most of the time, their real age can’t be seen just by their appearance. It can be seen that stars are very strong in maintaining their bodies.

Appearance can maintain a good state through cosmetics, but the body can’t cover up aging through these. If you want to be young, you have to exercise. In the popular variety show of mango station before, there was a 52 year old female star who completely overturned everyone’s perception of this age group. She was Yi Nengjing.

Yi Nengjing has always been a topic. Although the outside world has some complaints about her emotional and marital problems, it will never affect her own pace of life. In the program, her good figure and elastic face make everyone turn into lemon essence every second. In some of her photos, we can feel the real meaning of the word “good figure” more intuitively.

On the Internet, you can often see the interactive group photo of Yi Nengjing and her son, which will give people a sense of “lovers” confusion. In fact, she also once gained 140 Jin, which is very common during pregnancy and childbirth. Unlike many people, she takes action immediately after giving birth, doing all kinds of strength training and controlling her diet almost every day.

After unremitting efforts, she finally lost 100 Jin, but she fell in love with the feeling of fitness. Every time I see her jump desperately in order to pick an action in the program, it is always very touching. Although she is older in the program, she is much tighter and has better muscle lines than other female stars.

Her girlish figure benefits from her usual exercise. It’s a good choice to choose fitness if you want to be young.

Next, let’s give you a group of Amway lower limb strength training movements, which can optimize the leg lines, reduce thigh fat, and raise the hips. Let’s practice with me.
Action 1: alternate squat with Kettlebell

Action tips: * prepare a suitable fox. Put it in front of us, feet apart, slightly wider than shoulders, waist straight, core tight. Then inhale, bend your knees, crouch back and down to the thigh parallel to the ground, lift Hu Ming’s body with both hands and stand up straight.
Then exhale and do another squat, with my thighs close to the ground and the weight on our hip muscles. In the process of doing, you can hold the Kettlebell alternately with both hands, or you can hold the Kettlebell with both hands at the same time. A group of 15-20. Repeat four groups.
**Action 2: stretch ring supine single leg hip bridge

Action tips: * prepare a yoga mat and an elastic ring. Lie on the yoga mat, put the elastic hoop over the knees of our two legs, bend our knees, step our feet on the ground firmly, with the hind tendons close to our hips.
Then straighten one leg, hold still, exhale, push the hips, tighten the core, and lift our hips up until we tighten our synchronization.
Inhale slowly and fall close to the mat. This movement can not only train our hip muscles, but also train our core stability. A group of about 15 ~ 20, each of four groups.
**Action 3: push up the side leg with elastic ring

**Action tips: * prepare a yoga mat and a stretch rope. Take talisai and kneel down on the yoga mat at the knees of our legs, support the ground with both hands, from a prone position.
Keep your back straight and your core tight. Then move your weight to one leg and lift the other leg to the side. Use the gravity of the elastic ring to tighten your hips.
Inhale, the knees slowly fall close to the mat, and then exhale, the lid is raised, and our knees tighten our hips. A group of about 15 ~ 20, each of four groups.

The elastic ring used in the above action diagram is made of polyester material, and the inner side is made of latex yarn, which can prevent slipping and won’t curl. For example, the plastic ring will curl. Elastic, not broken, suitable for different groups, easy to carry, whether on business or outdoors, you can put it in your bag, you can take it out at any time.

entry.title: Why Zhang Junning, 38, is still charming and elegant is inseparable from her daily work
entry.content:
Now in the entertainment circle, there are many stars who insist on fitness, and everyone’s fitness consciousness is very strong. Many female stars have the habit of annual fitness, such as Mo Wenwei, Sun Li and Zheng Xiuwen. It is precisely because they adhere to fitness and diet control, so that they can still maintain a girlish figure in middle age.

Speaking of this, I have to mention a goddess of temperament. She is Zhang Junning from Taiwan. Her love for fitness can be found in many programs, and it is precisely because of her persistent love and self-discipline lifestyle that she can still maintain her 20-year-old figure at the age of nearly 40.

In mango station, there is a variety show after dinner, but as a guest, she can get up early in the morning and go for a morning run. And in the whole recording process of the program, she is also the first person to get up. In the photos on the Internet, we can also find that her daily life is a girl who likes to run in the morning and do yoga.

The most amazing thing is that she has run marathons many times, and she will do them whenever she has time. In the case of no filming and no work, Zhang Junning would spend her time in the gym. Even Peng Yuyan, the male god of fitness, said in an interview that it’s really rare for such a self disciplined person as Zhang Junning. From some of their interactive photos, we can also find that their friendship basically began with fitness.

Sometimes when I see Zhang Junning’s photos on the Internet, I always feel like I’m in the wrong place. At first glance, it looks like a picture of a fitness expert. In addition to morning running and yoga, she also enjoys meditation and some strength training. It is also because of her love that she has been keeping fit for more than ten years in a row. This kind of spirit and high executive power of refusing to compromise to her laziness makes her have a good figure that many girls dream of.

The reason why Zhang Junning, 38, has a 20-year-old body is that she not only controls her diet, but also keeps fit day after day.

Next, I’ll give you a group of abdominal training movements that Zhang Junning usually does. It’s no longer a distant dream to keep a girl’s sense. Let’s learn!
Action 1: supine with elbow touching knee alternately

Action tips: * first prepare a yoga mat, and then we lie on the yoga mat with our hands on our ears to keep the core tight. We should pay attention to our waist not to arch up, need to fully stick to the mat. Then touch the knee joint of the left leg with the elbow joint of the right hand. At this time, the other leg is straight. After this is done, it should be carried out on the other side, and then the two sides should be carried out alternately. This movement is mainly to exercise our internal and external oblique muscles, 30 times in each group, repeat 4 groups.
**Action 2: lie on your back and start at both ends

Action tips: * this action is mainly to exercise the upper and lower abdominal muscles. First, we prepare a yoga mat and then lie on it. At this time, we need a weight-bearing tablet. Barbell is a very good weight-bearing tool. Please remember that our legs have been suspended, not on the ground. Then hold the barbell with both hands, and roll up the upper part of the body. At this time, we need to take back our legs, then put the barbell piece on the insteps of my legs, and then stretch out my legs, and then the upper part of the body falls back on the cushion. We can exercise the whole abdominal muscles, 20 times in each group, four groups.
**Action 3: load rotation

**Action tips: * we need to prepare a medicine ball, and then sit on the yoga mat, with legs suspended and upper body suspended, and then the whole abdominal muscles should be tightened. Because this movement is more difficult, if your legs can not be suspended, you can put your legs on the ground. Hold the ball with both hands, and then swing left and right, driving our whole abdominal internal and external oblique muscles. Do not move too much, 40 times in each group, do four groups.
Goddesses keep fit all the time. Why don’t you take action? Please follow our tutorial.

entry.title: Zhang Zetian loves to keep fit. From milk tea girl to muscle girl, her figure has changed a lot
entry.content:
With the growth of age, women will be more and more old, the more obvious is the appearance of crow’s feet and eight character lines on the face. Aging is the normal state of nature, no one in the world can never be old. But planned fitness can delay aging, which is also the secret of many young girls’ choice.

When we talk about “sister of milk tea” Zhang Zetian, our first impression is her pure and white appearance and slender figure. At the beginning, she became popular because of her pure appearance of holding milk tea, but Zhang Zetian changed a “hard girl” style inadvertently.

A group of amazing photos of her on the Internet, in which she is obviously rolling iron. The arm is not the type of weak women in the past, but has obvious muscle lines, full body strength. She also said in the accompanying text, long-term fitness will be fruitful, the body is his best loyal partner!

In addition to making iron, she also likes to fight boxing, which subverts her previous pure and weak personality. When learning boxing, it’s inevitable that her joints will be red and swollen, which is also caused by her hard practice. But she still insisted, there is no complaint, there is no affectation.

Many people think that she just married a rich husband, but in fact she is very strict with herself. Whether it’s school work, business or keeping fit, she has always been very disciplined. She never regarded herself as someone’s accessory, instead, she became more and more excellent.

If you want to have ant waist and character muscle lines like sister milk tea, you can’t do without fitness, and fitness is also the healthiest and can prolong life.

entry.title: Zhong Nanshan, 84, is still tall and strong. Fitness can strengthen the body and fight against aging
entry.content:
At the end of January 2020, the epidemic began to ravage. Too many people have homes and can’t go back. Some people are trapped on barren mountain roads and can only rely on bread to satisfy their hunger. The novel coronavirus pneumonia is much more terrible than we think, but many medical staff are actively involved in the epidemic prevention team. Now the shadow of the epidemic has gradually left us. When Xiaobian watched the anti epidemic commendation Conference on TV, he had mixed feelings.

In particular, “Zhong Nanshan” is our spiritual pillar. He is still struggling in the front line when the epidemic is spreading very fast. He is 84 years old this year. Despite the terror of the epidemic, he appeared when the people of the country needed help most.

When he received the medal of honor at the conference, his energetic mental state was clearly displayed. Even when he came on stage, he was like a young man, walking very fast.

He doesn’t look like an old man in his 80s, no matter from his behavior or body. He didn’t have the slightest bit of fat on his body. He looked like a budding young man in a stiff suit. The main reason why he can keep a good figure is because of his persistence. He has been keeping fit in private.

He once said in an interview that he had all kinds of fitness tools at home, such as treadmill, dumbbell and so on. And as long as he has time, he will not indulge himself, even when he is busy with work, he will take time to exercise.

This spirit of never giving up is exactly what we lack, but this is the secret of Zhong Nanshan’s ability to keep fit. Keeping fit is not a matter of one day, but a matter of gradual progress. As long as the patience to adhere to a top hour every day to lose weight, then you can delay.

Next, Xiao Bian will share with you a set of shoulder muscle training movements, want to increase the muscle of the little partner to learn!
Action 1: barbell neck back press

Action Essentials: * * this action is mainly the deltoid muscle of martial arts training. Prepare a barbell, sit on a stool, keep your back straight, tighten the core, hold the barbell with both hands and lift it over your head, exhale when pushing, and inhale when falling. Drop from the back of the head, 12 times in each group, 4 groups.
**Action 2: standing dumbbell side lift

Action tips: * prepare a pair of dumbbells suitable for your own strength, keep your feet as wide as your hips, keep your body stable, keep your core tight, and keep your eyes in front. Hold the dumbbell tightly with both hands and lift it from both sides of your body. Then we lift it to shoulder height and keep our elbow slightly flexed. Don’t straighten out completely. Otherwise, elbow joint will be damaged. Exhale when lifting and inhale when slowly lowering. Do 12 times in each group and do four groups.
**Action 3: alternate dumbbell standing position and flat lift

**Action tips: * prepare a pair of dumbbells suitable for your own weight, open your feet, stand on the ground, keep your body stable, tighten your core, face the front with both eyes, when exhaling, lift the dumbbell with one hand to the same height as your shoulder, and then slowly fall, 12 times on each side of each group, 4 groups.
